, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin (5-HT) is an\nimportant neurotransmitter in the brain-gut interaction with 80% of the total\nbody 5-HT located in the GI tract.[76] Serotonin is released by\nenterochromaffin cells and platelets a<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin is a natural\nchemical in the brain and body that functions as both a neurotransmitter and a\nhormone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It plays many roles in\nregulating mood, memory, sleep, digestion, and more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin production is\nthe result of an internal biochemical process of the metabolization or\nbreakdown of the amino acid L-Tryptophan. The result of this breakdown is\n5-Hydroxytryptophan (5-HTP), which is the direct chemical precursor to\nSerotonin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin produced from\n5-HTP is used by the body for various important purposes, including controlling\ndigestion and mood.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mbqZeLrT21U/WMkR5NlAS1I/AAAAAAABRrU/R46qKkKgazsodwBqgVSl3_SzXh1RrkKzgCLcB/s1600/down88load.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mbqZeLrT21U/WMkR5NlAS1I/AAAAAAABRrU/R46qKkKgazsodwBqgVSl3_SzXh1RrkKzgCLcB/s400/down88load.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin is produced\nboth in the brain and in the GI tract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 85% of the body\u2019s\nSerotonin supply is found in the intestinal tract and in blood platelets. The\nremaining supply is found in the central nervous system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tryptophan is an\nessential amino acid. It is considered essential because it cannot be\nsynthesized in the body and must be obtained through the diet or supplements.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tryptophan from food or supplements travels to the liver where it is broken\ndown by the enzyme Tryptophan hydroxylase into 5-HTP and other metabolites\nincluding niacin (Vitamin B3).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 5-HTP travels\nthrough the bloodstream to the brain, crosses the barrier separating the blood\nfrom the brain, and enters the brain tissue. In the brain, 5-HTP is converted\nin the pineal gland into Serotonin. In its role as a neurotransmitter,\nSerotonin regulates the intensity of synaptic signaling. Serotonin plays\nvarious other important roles, affecting both bodily and psychological\nfunctioning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here\u2019s a partial list\nof what Serotonin does in the body:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regulation of mood,\nappetite, digestion, social behaviors, libido, sleep, and memory;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Supporting role in the\nproduction of breast milk;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Used for metabolizing\nbones;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maintains\ncardiovascular system efficiency;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Helps to regenerates\nthe liver;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Necessary for efficient\ncell division<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no specific\ntest for IBS\u2026Diagnosis of IBS happens one of two ways, either by \u201cdiagnosis of\nexclusion\u201d or the symptom based approach.&nbsp;\nDiagnosis of exclusion may involve one or more tests such as an\nultrasound, thyroid function test, endoscopy (rigid/flexible sigmoidoscopy,\ncolonoscopy, barium enema) to examine the colonic lumen for other possible\npathology, complete blood count and stool examination to rule out lactose intolerance\nand the presence of occult blood, parasites and pathogenic bacteria \u2026 The\nsymptom based approach uses developed criteria for the diagnosis of IBS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>GANDHI HAD IBS.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>&nbsp;HE\nWAS MISDIRECTED TO HAVING ENEMAS TWICE A DAY ADMINISTERED BY NAKED TEENAGE\nGIRLS\u2014&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>GANDHI WOULD RETURN THE FAVOUR..&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHILE IN SOUTH AFRICA HIS ENEMAS WERE\nLACED WITH KHAT LEAF EXTRACT ( A POTENT DRUG )<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHILE ON SHIP VOYAGES ,\nGANDHI WOULD TAKE HIS OWN GOAT ALONG, FOR MILK</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Serotonin\ndoes not cross the blood\u2013brain barrier.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">5-HTP\nreadily crosses the blood-brain barrier without receptors or channels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Serotonin\ndoes not cross the blood-brain barrier, so serotonin outside of the brain (in\nthe gut, platelets, heart, and liver) stays separate from serotonin in the\nbrain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">L-5-hydroxytryptophan\n(5-HTP) is the immediate precursor of serotonin. It is readily synthesized into\nserotonin without biochemical feedback.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">5-Hydroxytryptophan\n(5-HTP) is an amino acid precursor of serotonin with anti-depressant,\nanti-anxiety, sleep, and weight loss benefits, but with some caveats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\namino acid tryptophan is converted to 5-HTP before it is converted to\nserotonin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">5-HTP\ngets converted into serotonin both inside and outside of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You\ncan't get 5-HTP from food. The amino acid tryptophan, which the body uses to\nmake 5-HTP, can be found in &nbsp;nuts, seeds,\ncheese, red meat, chicken, , fish, oats, beans, lentils, and eggs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tryptophan,\nan essential amino acid, is an important precursor for the neurotransmitter\nserotonin.&nbsp; Serotonin is considered a\n\u201cfeel good\u201d chemical, promoting feelings of sleepiness, relaxation and\ncalm.&nbsp; It is also the precursor for\nmelatonin, another chemical important for sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Surya\nnamaskar , Yoga and Meditation controls cortisol (stress hormone) and increases\nthe production of serotonin (mood-stabilizer hormone)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Surya\nNamaskar and Yoga exercise causes an increase in tryptophan, which is a\nprecursor to serotonin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Direct\nnatural sunlight &nbsp;helps serotonin\nsynthesis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ayurvedic\nmassage therapy helps cut down the stress hormone cortisol while boosting\nserotonin levels and increasing dopamine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prolonged\nperiods of stress can deplete serotonin levels. Serious and systematic stress\ncan have an impact on the body's ability to produce and synthesize serotonin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nmeans that you should stay away from stressful situations as much as possible,\nand find healthy ways to deal with stress once it comes your way. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pranayama\nand Meditation are useful tools<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">People with IBS have been found to have less\nof the \u2018good\u2019 types bacteria in the gut (Lactobacilli and Bifidobacteria) ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ideally\nwe want a balanced ecosystem in the gut in which the beneficial probiotic\n(lactic-acid producing) bacteria predominate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Those taking the probiotics felt\nless anxious and depressed and also had higher levels of friendly bacteria\n(Lactobacillus and Bifidobacteria)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/probiotics-prebiotics-friendly-gut.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/probiotics-prebiotics-friendly-gut.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Again, our brains communicate with our guts via\nthe \u2018brain-gut axis\u2019.&nbsp; One part of the\nbrain-gut axis is the same system that control our stress response.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The hypothalamic\u2013pituitary\u2013adrenal axis (or\nHPA axis) prepares our bodies to be able to mount an attack or flee like the\nwind in face of danger. To do this various hormones and chemical are released.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These are the same substances that are used\nto allow the brain and gut to communicate. Therefore, it\u2019s not surprising that\nstress may also affect our guts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DduN12D019M/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/DduN12D019M?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Yoga understood\nthat the vagus nerve is part of your parasympathetic \u201crest and digest\u201d nervous\nsystem.&nbsp; Yoga stimulated the vagus nerve\nto effectively respond to emotional trauma and overcome it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vagus nerve\nstimulation can enhance the \u201cextinction of conditioned FEAR\u201d, making it useful\nfor severe anxiety..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Powerful emotions like\nanxiety are influenced by nerves in your gut. Butterflies in your stomach is a\nsimple example.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin is a neurotransmitter and hormone that is involved in\nthe transmission of nerve impulses and is key to mood regulation including\nfeelings of happiness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antidepressant medications called selective serotonin\nreuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) increase serotonin levels\u2014but can also provoke gut\nissues such as irritable bowel syndrome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, microbes in your\ngut are important for the production of serotonin. &nbsp;&nbsp;The cells that produce serotonin depend on\nmicrobes to manufacture it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<ol id=\"bc_0_200TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVIL\nPHARMA IS NOW TRYING TO MAKE MOOLAH OUT OF THIS&nbsp;\n-- NOT WITH FOOD BUT PROBIOTIC MEDICINES ( PILLS/ SHAKES ) WHICH DON\u2019T WORK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>AYURVEDA\nUSED ORGANIC VEGAN FOOD TO COMBAT DISEASE <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CANNIBALISM\nAND EXCESSIVE CONSUMPTION OF PIG MEAT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR HOMOSEXUALITY AMONG\nWHITE MEN.&nbsp; HINDUSM DOES NOT ALLOW PORK\nCONSUMPTION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nvast majority of these single-celled visitors are based in the colon, where no\nless than 1 trillion reside in each gram of intestinal content.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To put\nthat unwieldy number into perspective, our bodies consist of roughly 30\ntrillion cells. So, in a very real sense, we are more bacteria than man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The &nbsp;gut bacteria belong to &nbsp;more than 1,000 different species in all.\nCollectively, they are termed the microbiome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>COMMIE\nIDIOTS &nbsp;SAY GOD DOES NOT EXIST--&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>THESE COMMIE ATHEIST &nbsp;CUNTS DON\u2019T EVEN KNOW THE WONDERS OF THE MOST\nCOMPLICATED MACHINE ON EARTH\u2014THE HUMAN BODY WITH A CONSCIOUS BRAIN .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nlinks between our gut and brain are hormonal, immunological, and neural, via\nthe central nervous system and the enteric nervous system, which governs the\nfunction of the gut. Collectively, they are termed the gut-brain axis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nhumans, the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal (HPA) axis is the primary responder\nto stresses of any kind. It is one of the major players in the limbic system\nand is heavily involved in emotions and memory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Stress\nactivates the HPA axis and eventually results in the release of cortisol - the\n\"stress hormone\" - which has a variety of effects on many organs,\nincluding the brain and gut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nthis way, the brain's response to stress has a direct influence on the cells of\nthe gut, including epithelial and immune cells, enteric neurons, interstitial\ncells of Cajal (the pacemakers of the bowels), and enterochromaffin cells\n(serotonin synthesizing cells).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/gut-feeling-and-intuition-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/gut-feeling-and-intuition-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Modern\nstudies , using food-borne pathogens, provided evidence that bacteria in the\nintestines can activate stress circuits by directly activating the vagus nerve\n- a cranial nerve supplying a number of organs, including the upper digestive\ntract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR GOVT\nROMOTES CANDIDA YEAST FOR POLITICAL DONATIONS.&nbsp;\nPEOPLE WITH CANDIDA ALBICANS BEHAVE LIKE CUNTS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/candida-albicans-darling-of-evil-pharma.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/candida-albicans-darling-of-evil-pharma.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE ASK\nTHE MODI GOVT TO MAKE SURE INDIAN WOMEN DELIVER BABIES NATURALLY.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">PUNISH GREEDY GYNEACOLOGISTS WHO DO EXCESSIVE\nC-SECTION. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">PROFILE THEM. </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">DO NOT\nGIVE MATERNITY LEAVE TO CHUTNEY MARYs WHO DO NOT BREAST FEED THE CHILD \u2013\nBECAUSE SHE WANTS HER TITS TO BE MORE ATTRACTIVE FOR HER ILLICIT OVER \u2013THE PEON\nIN OFFICE .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When a\nmother gives birth vaginally and if she breastfeeds, she passes on colonies of\nessential microbes to her baby.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;This continues a chain of maternal heritage\nthat stretches through female ancestry for thousands of generations, if all\nhave been vaginally born and breastfed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I\nAM SUCH A FORTUNATE BABY , NOW AGED 61.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With\nformula feeding, the baby won\u2019t receive the 700 species of microbes found in\nbreast milk. Inside breast milk, there are special sugars called human milk\noligosaccharides (HMO\u2019s) that are indigestible by the baby. &nbsp;&nbsp;These sugars are designed to feed the\nmother\u2019s microbes newly arrived in the baby\u2019s gut. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By multiplying quickly, the \u2018good\u2019 bacteria\ncrowd out any potentially harmful pathogens. These GOOD bacteria help train the\nbaby\u2019s naive immune system, teaching it to identify what is to be tolerated and\nwhat is pathogen to be attacked. This leads to the optimal training of the\ninfant immune system resulting in a child\u2019s best possible LIFE LONG health.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\">I ASK\nTHE HEALTH MINISTER TO READ THIS POST AND DO HIS JOB.&nbsp; &nbsp;BE A\nSELF STARTER . &nbsp;&nbsp;DON\u2019T WAIT FOR MODI TO TELL YOU WHAT TO DO.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Over\n99% of the bacteria in the gut are anaerobes, but in the cecum, aerobic\nbacteria reach high densities<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I AM\nTHE FIRST PERSON ON THE PLANET TO EXPLAIN THE USE OF APPENDIX WHICH CONTAINS\nAEROBIC BACTERIA \u2026&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IF YOU EAT RAW MEAT\nFOR A YEAR, YOUR APPENDIX WILL BECOME LARGE.&nbsp;\nIF YOU HAVE A BABY AFTER A YEAR, THE BABYs APPENDIX WILL BE LARGE ON\nBIRTH..&nbsp; </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/human-appendix-misunderstood-organ-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/human-appendix-misunderstood-organ-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">YOGA\nHAS ENDING DOWN ASANA TO SURCHARGE YOUR APPENDIX &nbsp;AND ASSHOLE ( PIN WORM ) &nbsp;WITH OXYGEN\u2014FOR AEROBIC BACTERA</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_178b+seedxwkD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_177T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_177TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_177TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_178b+seedxwkD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_177TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_177TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_178b+seedxwkD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_177TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_177TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_177TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_177B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4780092400576225158\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_177M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html?showComment=1499856592802#c4780092400576225158\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 12, 2017 at 4:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_177MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nIn Kerala we never had Ulcerative Colitis as we cooked in Virgin coconut oil and had our curries infused with fresh turmeric.<br />\n<br />\nExcessive consumtion of humpless cow beef causes UC<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative Colitis is a condition that causes inflammation and ulceration of the inner lining of the rectum and colon (the large bowel). In UC, tiny ulcers develop on the surface of the lining and these may bleed and produce pus.<br />\n<br />\nThe inflammation usually begins in the rectum and lower colon, but it may affect the entire colon. If UC only affects the rectum, it is called proctitis, while if it affects the whole colon it may be called total colitis or pancolitis.<br />\n<br />\nIt\u2019s one of the two main forms of Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD). The other is Crohn\u2019s Disease which is monopolized by Ashkenazi Jews<br />\n<br />\nHOMOSEXUAL MALES WHO ENGAGE IN ANAL SEX ARE MORE PRONE TO UC<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative Colitis is a chronic condition. This means that it is ongoing and life-long, although you may have periods of good health (remission), as well as times when symptoms are more active (relapses or flare-ups).<br />\n<br />\nThe most common symptoms are:----<br />\n\u2022 Diarrhoea<br />\n\u2022 Cramping pains in the abdomen<br />\n\u2022 Tiredness and fatigue<br />\n\u2022 Feeling generally unwell or feverish<br />\n\u2022 Loss of appetite and weight loss<br />\n\u2022 Anaemia (a reduced level of red blood cells).<br />\n<br />\nOne in 200 people in the west have UC because of consumption of A1 milk, processed foods and GM foods.<br />\n<br />\nIt can start at any age, though it often appears for the first time between the ages of 15 and 25. It affects men and women equally.<br />\n<br />\nMore than a third of people with UC develop other conditions outside of the digestive system, mainly affecting the joints, eyes and skin.<br />\n<br />\nInflammation of the joints (arthritis) affects about one out of 10 people with UC. Some people with UC also develop ankylosing spondylitis, a condition in which the joints in the spine and pelvis become inflamed and stiff.<br />\n<br />\nA variety of other health conditions can be associated with UC, including:----<br />\nskin problems, such as mouth ulcers, blisters and ulcers on the skin, and painful red swellings, usually on the legs<br />\ninflammation of the eyes<br />\nthinner and weaker bones<br />\nliver inflammation<br />\nblood clots (including deep vein thrombosis)<br />\nanaemia.<br />\n<br />\nFlare-ups can be disruptive to relationships and work \u2013 sometimes you may need to cancel engagements and take time off when you are feeling unwell.<br />\n<br />\nAround a quarter of people are children or adolescents when they are diagnosed with IBD, and symptoms in young people often appear around the age of 12. Ulcerative Colitis in children tends to be more extensive in children than adults, and consequently more severe .<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative colitis affects only the colon and rectum. Crohn's can affect any part of the digestive tract.<br />\n<br />\nIn severe cases, people may have diarrhea 10 to 20 times a day.<br />\n<br />\nThe disease can also cause other problems, such as joint pain, eye problems, or liver disease.<br />\n<br />\nTests that may be done include:----<br />\n<br />\nA colonoscopy. In this test, a doctor uses a thin, lighted tool to look at the inside of your entire colon. At the same time, the doctor may take a sample (biopsy) of the lining of the colon.<br />\nBlood tests, which look for infection or inflammation.<br />\nStool sample testing to look for blood, infection, and white blood cells.<br />\nCrohn\u2019s disease can affect any part of the gastrointestinal (GI) tract, but ulcerative colitis affects only the colon. Additionally, while Crohn\u2019s disease can affect all layers of the bowel wall, ulcerative colitis only affects the lining of the colon.<br />\nWhile both ulcerative colitis and Crohn\u2019s disease are types of inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), they should not be confused with irritable bowel Syndrome (IBS), a disorder that affects the muscle contractions of the colon. IBS is not characterized by intestinal inflammation..<br />\n<br />\ncontinued to 2---</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_177MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_177BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_177B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_202B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c900289221694158819\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_202M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html?showComment=1499856668741#c900289221694158819\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 12, 2017 at 4:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_202MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1 --<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative colitis-----<br />\nLimited to the large intestine (colon and rectum)<br />\nOccurs in the rectum and colon, involving a part or the entire colon<br />\nAppears in a continuous pattern<br />\nInflammation occurs in innermost lining of the intestine<br />\nAbout 30% of people in remission will experience a relapse in the next year<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative colitis is 3 times more common than Crohn disease.<br />\n<br />\nHOWEVER --CHRONS DIFFERENCE--<br />\n<br />\nInflammation may develop anywhere in the GI tract from the mouth to the anus<br />\nMost commonly occurs at the end of the small intestine<br />\nMay appear in patches<br />\nMay extend through entire thickness of bowel wall<br />\nAbout 72 % of people in remission will have at least 1 relapse over the next 4 years<br />\n<br />\nThe UC inflammation causes your bowel to move its contents rapidly and empty frequently. As cells on the surface of the lining of your bowel die, ulcers form. The ulcers cause bleeding and discharge of mucus and pus.<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative colitis may cause additional conditions such as:--<br />\n<br />\njoint pain<br />\njoint swelling<br />\nnausea and decreased appetite<br />\nskin problems<br />\nmouth sores<br />\neye inflammation<br />\nUlcerative colitis increases your risk of colon cancer. The longer you have the disease, the higher your risk of this cancer.<br />\n<br />\nOther complications of ulcerative colitis include:--<br />\n<br />\nthickening of the intestinal wall<br />\nsepsis, or blood infection<br />\nsevere dehydration<br />\ntoxic megacolon, or a rapidly swelling colon<br />\nliver disease (rare)<br />\nintestinal bleeding<br />\nkidney stones<br />\ninflammation of your skin, joints, and eyes<br />\nrupture of your colon<br />\nankylosing spondylitis, which involves inflammation of joints between your spinal bones<br />\n<br />\nTests to diagnose ulcerative colitis often include:<br />\n<br />\nStool test: A doctor examines your stool for blood, bacteria, and parasites.<br />\nEndoscopy: A doctor uses a flexible tube to examine your stomach, esophagus, and small intestine.<br />\nColonoscopy: This diagnostic test involves insertion of a long, flexible tube into your rectum to examine the inside of your colon.<br />\nBiopsy: A surgeon removes a tissue sample from your colon for analysis.<br />\nCT scan: This is a specialized X-ray of your abdomen and pelvis.<br />\nBlood tests are often useful in the diagnosis of ulcerative colitis. A complete blood count looks for signs of anemia (low blood count). Other tests indicate inflammation such as a high level of C-reactive protein and a high sedimentation rate. Your doctor may also order specialized antibody tests.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIf your symptoms are severe, you\u2019ll need to be hospitalized to correct the effects of dehydration and loss of electrolytes that diarrhea causes and to treat any complications<br />\n<br />\nThe severity of UC can be graded as follows:---<br />\nMild: Bleeding per rectum, fewer than 4 bowel motions per day<br />\nModerate: Bleeding per rectum, more than 4 bowel motions per day<br />\nSevere: Bleeding per rectum, more than 4 bowel motions per day, and a systemic illness with hypoalbuminemia (<30 br=\"\" g=\"\">The diagnosis of ulcerative colitis is best made with endoscopy and mucosal biopsy for histopathology.<br />Rectal involvement occurs even when the rest of the colon is spared.<br /><br />Fecal studies have shown that the composition of gut bacteria in those with ulcerative colitis is very different to that in healthy people, so probiotics may be helpful for correcting the imbalance.<br /><br />Your body absorbs nitrates from food that you eat and these turn into nitrites in the body. Usually, healthy urine shouldn\u2019t contain nitrites. However, if you have any kind of bacterial infection in your urinary tract, nitrites will show up in your urine.<br /><br />Nitrites in your urine could also mean that you have an inflammatory bowel disease (IBD). Inflammation in part or all of your digestive tract is called an inflammatory bowel disease. This usually includes ulcerative colitis and Crohn\u2019s disease.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 3-</30></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_202MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_202BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_202B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_203B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c599600132629490875\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_203M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html?showComment=1499856735008#c599600132629490875\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 12, 2017 at 4:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_203MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative colitis occasionally involves the terminal ileum, as a result of an incompetent ileocecal valve. In these cases, which may constitute as many as 10% of patients, the reflux of noxious inflammatory mediators from the colon results in superficial mucosal inflammation of the terminal ileum, called backwash ileitis. Up to about 30 cm of the terminal ileum may be affected.<br />\n<br />\nA variety of immunologic changes have been documented in ulcerative colitis. Subsets of T cells accumulate in the lamina propria of the diseased colonic segment. In patients with ulcerative colitis, these T cells are cytotoxic to the colonic epithelium. This change is accompanied by an increase in the population of B cells and plasma cells, with increased production of immunoglobulin G (IgG) and immunoglobulin E (IgE).<br />\n<br />\nThe ulcerated areas are soon covered by granulation tissue. Excessive fibrosis is not a feature of the disease. The undermining of mucosa and an excess of granulation tissue lead to the formation of polypoidal mucosal excrescences, which are known as inflammatory polyps or pseudopolyps.<br />\n.<br />\nUlcerative colitis is the result of an abnormal response by your body's immune system. Normally, the cells and proteins that make up the immune system protect you from infection. In people with IBD, however, the immune system mistakes food, bacteria, and other materials in the intestine for foreign or invading substances. When this happens, the body sends white blood cells into the lining of the intestines, where they produce chronic inflammation and ulcerations.<br />\nForeign substances (antigens) in the environment may be the direct cause of the inflammation, or they may stimulate the body's defenses to produce an inflammation that continues without control.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/ayurvedic-massage-and-quantum-medicine.html<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/probiotics-prebiotics-friendly-gut.html<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/probiotics-prebiotics-friendly-gut.html<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/ibs-irritable-bowel-syndrome-vagus_14.html<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/small-intestinal-bacterial-overgrowth.html<br />\n<br />\n85% of IBD patients are low in vitamin D<br />\n<br />\nDO SURYANAMASKAR<br />\n<br />\nHAVE NATUROLAX BEFORE SLEEPING<br />\n<br />\nPsyllium husk are both known to increase butyrate production. Butyrate helps to repair the intestinal wall and reduce inflammation<br />\n<br />\nSurgery is necessary when there is massive bleeding, chronic and debilitating symptoms, perforation of your colon, or a severe blockage. A CT scan or colonoscopy can detect these serious problems.<br />\n<br />\nSurgery involves removing your entire colon with the creation of a new pathway for waste. This pathway can be out through a small opening in your abdominal wall or redirected back through the end of your rectum.<br />\n<br />\nTo redirect waste through your abdominal wall, your surgeon will make a small opening in your abdominal wall. The tip of your lower small intestine, or the ileum, is then brought to the skin\u2019s surface. Waste will drain through the opening into a bag. You will find that Jews have this contraption maximum on this planet by percentage<br />\n<br />\nIf waste is able to be redirected through your rectum, your surgeon removes the diseased part of your colon and rectum, but retains the outer muscles of your rectum. The surgeon then attaches your small intestine to the rectum to form a small pouch. After this surgery, you\u2019re able to pass stool through your rectum. Bowel movements will be more frequent and watery than normal.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_203MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_203BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_203B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_204B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6501120340593266000\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_204M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html?showComment=1499856803357#c6501120340593266000\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 12, 2017 at 4:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_204MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nPractices that may help include:----<br />\n<br />\ndrinking small amounts of water throughout the day<br />\neating smaller meals throughout the day<br />\nlimiting your intake of high-fiber foods<br />\navoiding fatty foods<br />\navoiding artificial sweeteners<br />\n<br />\nUlcerative colitis can be hard to live with. During a flare-up, it may seem like you are always running to the bathroom. White people who use rough toilet paper literally have no skin on their assholes. line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Liar Yeonmi Park \u2014 a North Korean defector who fled to\nChina and is now a student at Columbia University in New York.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In telling of her escape from North Korea, Park often\nsays she crossed three or even four mountains during the night to get to the\nborder and describes the pain she endured because her shoes had holes in them.\nHowever, Hyesan where Park was living is right on the river that divides the\ntwo countries and there are no mountains to cross.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;BELOW INFORMATION IS LIFTED FROM A LINK BELOW\u2014</b><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://jooparkblog.blogspot.in/2014/12/yeonmi-park-defector-who-fooled-world.html\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">http://jooparkblog.blogspot.in/2014/12/yeonmi-park-defector-who-fooled-world.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Monday, December 22,\n2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi Park: The\nDefector Who Fooled the World<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi Park: The\nDefector Who Fooled the World<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\u2019m writing this\nmessage because I care about human rights and North Korean defectors. I was\ninitially a big supporter of Yeonmi Park until I read Mary Ann Jolley\u2019s expos\u00e9\nat the Diplomat.com. Then I realized something was very wrong with Yeonmi\u2019s\nstory. So I began to do some research. The more I researched, the more shocked\nand outraged I became at the extent of her lies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people are still\nunaware of Jolley\u2019s article or are not willing to believe that Yeonmi is\nmisleading us. I made this document for everyone to see the truth. Ms. Park is\ndoing serious harm to the human rights field and to North Korean defectors.\nAfter she is exposed, many people around the world are going to feel betrayed.\nThey may not be willing to listen or care about other defectors. That would be\na tragic mistake, since many other defectors are surely honest and deserve our\nsupport.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The other reason I made\nthis document was the suspicious Yeonmi Park Foundation website. Mary Ann\nJolley pointed out that the website had a PayPal donate button, but there was\nno mention of how the money would be used. I was concerned that honest people\nwho want to help defectors might be sending their money into the wrong hands. I\nwas relieved when Yeonmi responded to the Diplomat.com article by taking her\nfoundation website down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her explanation (\u201cit\nwas a dummy website made by a friend that accidentally went live and couldn\u2019t\nreally receive donations\u201d) is obviously very dubious. We should thank Jolley\nfor helping to ensure that donations to defectors go through reputable\ncharities, with oversight and clear guidelines for how the money will be used.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\u2019m still very\nconcerned that Yeonmi and some of the people around her have a high potential\nto mislead others and harm North Korean defector causes. So I\u2019m sending this\ndocument out in the hopes that you will help spread the truth. This information\ncan be shared via email, as a web-link from my blogger website or downloaded as\na PDF at Scribd.com.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\u2019ve divided this\ndocument into four parts. Part I includes the most serious questions for\nYeonmi. I ask that if Yeonmi responds to these questions, she do it in the\norder that the questions are posed. I think the responses to the Diplomat.com\nexpos\u00e9 by Yeonmi and her promoter, Casey Lartigue Jr., were very misleading and\nvague. I\u2019ve challenged their responses in Part II. Part III includes some of\nYeonmi\u2019s other suspicious and inconsistent stories, but I don't want any\nquestions from Part III to be discussed until Part I is addressed first. People\nhave been distracted or confused by less important questions while missing the\nbig picture. Part IV is the conclusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;
