line-height: 150%;\">5:30-5:40 - \u201cI escaped\nwith my mom and father \u2013 the three of us.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1RZuk6AqA0U<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEDxHangang 5th Event </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;batang&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\ubc15\uc5f0\ubbf8</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> | </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;batang&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\ubc15\uc5f0\ubbf8</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> | TEDxHangang (July\n26, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5:15 (Yeonmi speaking\nKorean) \u201cI decided with my parents to leave the country\u2026 I crossed the Yalu\nRiver.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.sbs.com.au/news/dateline/story/celebrity-defector#interviewwithmaryann<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At just 16, Eun-mi fled\nthe country with a friend. Her family was devastated. Desperate to find her\nsister, Yeon-mi and her parents walked across the mountains to the border,\nwhere they bribed guards to cross the Tumen River to China. But there was no\nsign of Eun-mi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Journalist Mary Ann\nJolley): Park told us and a libertarian radio station in San Francisco earlier\nthis year that four days after her older sister fled the country, she and her\nmother and father crossed to China together.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In her interview with\nus she recalled the feeling she had as she crossed the river \u2026 \u201cAnd there were\ncars to get us because of the connections [her father\u2019s business connections]\nwith Chinese people and then we went to China directly.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: In numerous\ninterviews and her own speeches, Yeonmi says that she crossed the border into\nChina with her mom and dad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In these speeches and\ninterviews before she became famous, she never mentions the story of her mother\nbeing raped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">************* SUDDENLY,\nTHE STORY CHANGED ******************<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VERSION 2: ONLY YEONMI\nAND HER MOM CROSSED THE BORDER INTO CHINA (WITHOUT HER FATHER), AND SINCE THEY\nWERE VULNERABLE, YEONMI\u2019S MOTHER WAS RAPED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONSIDERING THE ABRUPT\nCHANGE IN NARRATIVE, DOES ANYONE HONESTLY BELIEVE THIS RAPE STORY IS TRUE?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/northkorea/11138496/Escape-from-North-Korea-How-I-escaped-horrors-of-life-under-Kim-Jong-il.html\n(October 10, 2014 article based on Yeonmi\u2019s interview with the Telegraph)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And so, on the night of\nMarch 30 2007, Yeonmi and her mother made their way towards the border with the\nhelp of a people smuggler. Yeonmi\u2019s father stayed behind, to minimise the\nrisks. They crossed three mountains and finally came to a frozen river that separated\nthe two countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Yeonmi stopped she\nfound herself in the Chinese province of Jilin. Here, Yeonmi and her mother set\nabout trying to find her sister. But she was nowhere to be found and the local\npeople smugglers refused to help. One even threatened to turn them in to\nChinese authorities unless he was allowed to have sex with Yeonmi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s mother\nimplored the man to leave her daughter alone and offered herself instead. \u2018She\nhad no choice,\u2019 Yeonmi says. \u2018Literally, in front of me, he raped her.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A few days later\nYeonmi\u2019s father, who had become concerned about their lengthy absence, slipped\nacross the border and managed to join them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: Previously,\nYeonmi said that her parents bribed border guards to get across the border.\nNow, Yeonmi is saying that she and her mother were guided across by a people\nsmuggler.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/10/31/how-titantic-helped-this-brave-young-woman-escape-north-korea-s-totalitarian-state.html\n(October 31, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the night of March\n30, 2007, Yeonmi and her mother set out to join Eunmi. Guided by a people\nsmuggler, they crossed a frozen river that separated the two countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When they arrived in\nthe Chinese province of Jilin, local authorities refused to help them find\nEunmi. One demanded to have sex with Yeonmi, who was barely 14, and threatened\nto send her and her mother back to North Korea if she didn\u2019t oblige. When her\nmother begged for mercy, she was raped instead. \u201cShe told me to turn around,\nbut I could hear her crying. It seemed like he had done this a thousand times.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon they were joined\nby Yeonmi\u2019s father.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: The same\ninconsistencies are repeated in this article, but now she claims it was a local\nauthority in China who raped her mother instead of a people smuggler.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: Crossing the\nborder from North Korea to China is very risky and dangerous. Many North\nKoreans get caught trying and sent to prison. After Yeonmi\u2019s sister went\nmissing, would the family risk further separation by leaving the father behind\nin North Korea, while the mother and young daughter venture into China alone?\nThe family would have to risk two separate border crossings, plus the potential\ntrafficking of Yeonmi and her mom, instead of all going together.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s original\nstory, that she and her parents crossed the border together, is probably true,\nwhich would make the story of her mother\u2019s rape false.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.vice.com/read/park-yeonmi-is-a-north-korean-celebrity\n(November 4, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Park was referring to a\nmoment when, separated from her father, her mother was raped in front of her by\na people smuggler who had threatened to turn them into the Chinese authorities\nunless he could have sex with the 13-year-old Park. Desperate to protect her\ndaughter, her mother offered herself instead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.com/news/world-south-asia-29809557\n(October 28, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWhen I was 13, I saw\nmy mother raped in front of my own eyes. The rapist targeted me and wanted to\nhave sex with me. I didn\u2019t even know the word sex. My mother got raped instead,\nand she sacrificed herself to be raped for me.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: Look at the\ndates of when she is telling different versions of her escape story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Version 1 of her escape\nstory (she crossed with her parents, no mention of rape) occurred earlier in\n2014, when she was lesser known.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the growing media\nattention, she suddenly starts telling Version 2 (she only crossed the border\nwith her mom, and her mom was raped).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q2: DID YEONMI WITNESS\nOR EXPERIENCE STARVATION/EATING GRASS TO SURVIVE IN NORTH KOREA?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VERSION ONE: YEONMI NEVER\nEVEN SAW ANYONE STARVING OR EATING GRASS TO SURVIVE, AND SHE DEFINITELY DIDN\u2019T\nEXPERIENCE THAT HERSELF.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kOAXaB5LTxg<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi on the South\nKorean talk show \u201cNow On My Way to Meet You,\u201d featuring North Korean defectors\ntelling stories about their lives<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Originally published on\nJan 20, 2013 http://tv.ichannela.com/meetnow<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">[</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;batang&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\uc774\uc81c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;batang&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\ub9cc\ub098\ub7ec</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">] 2013/01/20</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;batang&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\ubc29\uc1a1</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> 58</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;batang&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\ud68c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(During this show,\nYeonmi\u2019s pseudonym was \u201cYae-ju\u201d)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Conversation from\n2:00-4:00 in the YouTube clip)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Host Nam Hee Seok):\nWhen other members on the show mentioned that they were eating grass and\nstarving, Yae-ju (Yeonmi) said, \u201cWe didn\u2019t have that kind of situation in North\nKorea!\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why did she say that?\nShe didn\u2019t witness that kind of situation when she was young?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Yeonmi\u2019s Mom): \u201cWe\nwere not that rich, but at least we weren\u2019t suffering.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Her mom then says that\nother North Koreans would ask Yae-ju (Yeonmi) about what kind of rice she was\neating, since others couldn\u2019t afford to eat white rice. But Yeonmi only ate\nwhite rice.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mom: Her father did his\nbest to give his kids a better life, so\u2026the kids didn\u2019t know the truth about\nwhat was going on in North Korea. So when Yae-ju (Yeonmi) came on this show, it\nwas her opportunity to learn the real truth about North Korea\u201d (from other\nmembers on this show).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s Mom: Sometimes\nafter filming, Yae-ju (Yeonmi) called me and asked, \u2018Mom, am I really North\nKorean? Because I couldn\u2019t understand what the other members on the show were\ntalking about.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She thought other\nmembers were totally lying (about the hunger and other hardships they witnessed\nand experienced).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Host: Right. When she\ncame here for the first time, she said that they were lying!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s Mom: Yes, but\nI watched that episode, and what the other members said is totally true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COMMENT: SO\u2026ON A TALK\nSHOW IN JANUARY 2013, LONG BEFORE SHE BECAME FAMOUS, YEONMI SAID SHE NEVER EVEN\nSAW ANYONE STARVING OR EATING GRASS TO SURVIVE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">**AFTER INCREASING\nMEDIA ATTENTION, HER STORY CHANGED AGAIN **<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VERSION TWO: YEONMI NOW\nSAYS SHE WITNESSED OTHERS STARVING/EATING GRASS AND BUGS, AND YEONMI ACTUALLY\nSTARVED AND ATE GRASS/BUGS TO SURVIVE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lxFuFUSPePM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BBC News: 'I escaped\ndeath in North Korea' (October 29, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:18 (Yeonmi) Just only\nwhat we knew was that if we are staying here, we were going to die from (lack\nof) food\u2026 I was the one who starved\u2026 I literally had to eat grass, dragonflies\nand frozen potatoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi, then nine, and\nher 11-year-old sister, Eunmi, lived on their own during that time, eating\nrice, dragonflies, frogs, and grass to survive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/one-young-world/why-is-the-world-allowing-a-holocaust-to-happen-again-brave-north-korean-shares-harrowing-story-of-escape-30673558.html\n(October 18, 2014 article based on Yeonmi\u2019s interview)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi and her sister,\nEunmi were left to fend for themselves, at the age of nine and 11, foraging on\nthe mountainsides for grasses, plants, frogs and even dragonflies to avoid\nstarving to death. \"Everything I used to see, I ate them,\" she said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asked if any adults\naround knew the children were surviving alone, Yeonmi tries to explain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"People were dying\nthere. They don't care... most people are just hungry and that's why they don't\nhave the spirit or time to take care of other people.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CsOPQVJKvSc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hong Kong Special\n[North Korea Today (feat. Casey &amp; Yeonmi)] September 2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3:16 (Yeonmi) During\nthe Great Famine time, and even not during the Great Famine, for me to watch\ndead bodies was my routine life. That\u2019s how many people were dying from (lack\nof) food, and starving.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q3: WHAT HAPPENED TO\nYEONMI AND HER SISTER AFTER THEIR PARENTS WERE IMPRISONED?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VERSION ONE: THEY WERE\nALL SEPARATED. YEONMI LIVED WITH HER AUNT AND HER SISTER LIVED WITH HER UNCLE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0288zd0\n(BBC Radio interview October 17, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4:10 (Yeonmi) After my\nmother and father went to prison, the four of us all separated. So my sister\nwent to my uncle\u2019s house, and I went to my aunt\u2019s house -- and I lived there\nfor three years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VERSION TWO: YEONMI (9)\nAND HER SISTER (11) LIVED ALONE, AND STRUGGLED TO SURVIVE BY EATING GRASS, BUGS,\nETC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/one-young-world/why-is-the-world-allowing-a-holocaust-to-happen-again-brave-north-korean-shares-harrowing-story-of-escape-30673558.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her mother, too, was\ninterrogated and thrown into jail. Yeonmi and her sister, Eunmi were left to\nfend for themselves, at the age of nine and 11, foraging on the mountainsides\nfor grasses, plants, frogs and even dragonflies to avoid starving to death.\n\"Everything I used to see, I ate them,\" she said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ei-gGvLWOZI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s speech at the\nOne Young World Summit in Dublin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:10 (James Chau) I\nasked her, where did you live? And she said, \u201cWith my sister.\u201d (her sister was\n11 and Yeonmi was 9).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">2:18 (reporter) Who\nlooked after you?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEONMI\u2019S PUBLIC\nEXECUTION STORY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q4: DID YEONMI REALLY\nSEE HER BEST FRIEND\u2019S MOM PUBLICLY EXECUTED IN 2002?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--DUE TO SOUTH KOREAN\nDRAMAS, A HOLLYWOOD MOVIE OR A JAMES BOND MOVIE?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--EXECUTED IN A\nSTADIUM, OR ON THE STREET?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--HOW OLD WAS YEONMI AT\nTHE TIME, ELEVEN OR NINE?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.sbs.com.au/news/sites/sbs.com.au.news/files/transcripts/363709_insight_changingamindset_transcript.html\n(April 8, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEONMI PARK: (One of my\nbest friends), her mum saw some like American dramas or like South Korean\ndramas and then she got caught and then they decided to like give her like\npunishment as like public execution. So I went there with her, my friends, and\nthere I\u2026\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JENNY BROCKIE: This was\nto see your friend's mother executed?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEONMI PARK: Yeah, like\npublic execution in a big stadium. I must be there, it's like I need to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JENNY BROCKIE: How old\nwere you when that happened?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEONMI PARK: I was\neleven and I was with my friends.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/one-young-world/why-is-the-world-allowing-a-holocaust-to-happen-again-brave-north-korean-shares-harrowing-story-of-escape-30673558.html\n(article based on an interview with Yeonmi) (October 18, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When she was nine, she\nwas forced to watch her best friend's mother being executed on the street\nbefore her eyes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her only crime had been\nshe had watched a James Bond movie and shared the DVDs with neighbours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Watching her body\ncrumble to the ground was a seismic moment in how Yeonmi viewed the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/northkorea/11138496/Escape-from-North-Korea-How-I-escaped-horrors-of-life-under-Kim-Jong-il.html\n(long article about Yeonmi based on an extensive interview)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi Park was nine\nyears old when she was invited to watch her best friend\u2019s mother be shot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her crime was having\nwatched South Korean films and lending the DVDs to friends. Her punishment in\nthis most paranoid of dictatorships was death by firing squad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0288zd0\n(Yeonmi\u2019s interview with BBC Radio: October 16, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:05- 2:45 My best\nfriend\u2019s mom was killed for watching a Hollywood movie.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.theguardian.com/world/2014/aug/26/north-korea-defector-titanic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When she was nine years\nold, Park was forced to attend the execution of her classmate\u2019s mother. Her\ncrime? She had lent a South Korean movie to a friend. The townsfolk were\ngathered in a large stadium to watch the punishment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cShe got killed in\nfront of us,\u201d said Park, now 20 years-old. \u201cI was standing next to her daughter\n- my whole school had to go.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: I read that\nduring a public execution in North Korea, only the family members of the victim\nare forced to watch in the front row, without anyone else next to them. Is this\ntrue? If so, could Yeonmi really have been standing next to her friend during\nthe execution?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/10/31/how-titantic-helped-this-brave-young-woman-escape-north-korea-s-totalitarian-state.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The woman stood accused\nof watching a contraband James Bond DVD and leant it to friends\u2026It\u2019s more than\na decade later and she calmly recalls the shots ringing out, followed by an\nexplosion of blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ei-gGvLWOZI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s speech at the\nOne Young World Summit in Dublin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10:33 (Yeonmi) When I\nwas 9 years old, I saw my friend\u2019s mother publicly executed. Her crime?\nWatching a Hollywood movie.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in Hong Kong a few\nmonths ago, she told an audience the woman had been caught watching South\nKorean DVDs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Irish Independent\njournalist, Nicola Anderson, in a recent online video interview with Park\nseemed confused and asked her, \u201cIt was a movie from South Korea wasn\u2019t it?\u201d\nPark\u2019s response was, \u201cNo, Hollywood movie, James Bond.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Park was nine,\nwhich would have been around 2002, she says she saw her best friend\u2019s mother\nexecuted at a stadium in Hyesan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, according to\nseveral North Korean defectors from Hyesan who didn\u2019t want to be identified for\nfear of reprisal, public executions only ever took place on the outskirts of\nthe city, mostly at the airport, never in the stadium or streets, and there\nwere none after 2000 \u2013 the last they recall was a mass execution of ten or\neleven people in 1999.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEONMI\u2019S FATHER\u2019S\nBURIAL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q5: WAS HER FATHER\u2019S\nBODY BURIED, OR WAS HE CREMATED? WHO BURIED HER FATHER\u2019S BODY (OR ASHES)?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.sbs.com.au/news/dateline/story/celebrity-defector#interviewwithmaryann<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOTHER (Translation):\nWe paid two people to help carry his body. They went deep into the mountains\nand Yeon-mi went with them. Yeon-mi carried her father's body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEON-MI PARK: And then\nat 3 a.m. we had to move his body. Everybody's sleeping and then I buried him.\nLike, at midnight, by myself and I was sitting there and it was so cold. There\nwas nobody I could call. There was nobody who came to my father's funeral.\nNobody knows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/northkorea/11138496/Escape-from-North-Korea-How-I-escaped-horrors-of-life-under-Kim-Jong-il.html\n(long article about Yeonmi based on an extensive interview)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At 7.30 one cold January\nmorning, Yeonmi\u2019s father died. Without documents and facing arrest and\ndeportation if they were caught by Chinese police, his family were forced to\nbribe a local crematorium to destroy his body by night.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At three the following\nmorning, Yeonmi and her mother took his remains to a nearby mountain and\nsecretly buried them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0288zd0\n(Yeonmi\u2019s interview with BBC Radio: October 16, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8:35 I buried my father\nby myself in the mountain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q6: WHAT WERE THE\nCIRCUMSTANCES OF HER FATHER\u2019S IMPRISONMENT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ZEmDpkz0g4<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The N. Korean TV Star\nStanding Up To Kim Jong-Un (mini-documentary about Yeonmi, featuring interviews\nwith Yeonmi and her mother)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3:09 When Yeonmi was 8,\nher father was arrested for smuggling goods to China.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: Yeonmi was 8 in\n2001.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uDXkdjx7VAE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I Am a North Korean\nMillennial - Yeonmi Park (July 10, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:26 In 2004, my whole\nworld came crashing down. My father, my hero was arrested for his illegal\ntrading business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was three long years\nbefore I saw my father again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: In 2004, Yeonmi\nwas 11. Three years later (in 2007), he was released, when Yeonmi was 14.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sg3kC4uKDJU<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s TEDx Talk in\nBath, UK (November 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1:52 In 2002, when I\nwas 9 years old, my whole world came crashing down. My hero - my father - got\narrested for his illegal business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5:53 In 2007, after my\nfather got out of prison to get treatment, we decided to escape\u2026 Me and my\nmother went to China. We climbed three mountains and crossed the frozen river.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: In 2002, Yeonmi\nwas 9. Above, she said he was in prison for 3 years (2004-2007).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here, she says he was\nin prison for 5 years, from 2002-2007.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/10/31/how-titantic-helped-this-brave-young-woman-escape-north-korea-s-totalitarian-state.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi, then nine, and\nher 11-year-old sister, Eunmi, lived on their own during that time, eating\nrice, dragonflies, frogs, and grass to survive. After three years, Yeonmi\u2019s\nfather bribed his way out of prison but the brutal prison conditions had taken\na toll on his health.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2006, they moved to\nthe countryside, close to the Chinese border. Yeonmi\u2019s father was forced to\nforage for food, on a lucky day returning with black, frozen potatoes. \u201cWe\ncouldn\u2019t maintain our lives there because we were so hungry,\u201d she says. \u201cWe had\nto defect.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: Above, Yeonmi\u2019s\nfather was released from prison for medical treatment in 2007. Here, he bribed\nhis way out of prison in 2006.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Park says her father\nwas sentenced to 17 or 18 years in prison. Her mother told us he was initially\nsentenced to a year, but later it was increased to ten years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q7: WHAT WERE THE\nCIRCUMSTANCES OF HER MOTHER\u2019S IMPRISONMENT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ei-gGvLWOZI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi\u2019s speech at the\nOne Young World Summit in Dublin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:05 (James Chau) Her\nmother was interrogated for three years and taken to prison as well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:10 I asked her, where\ndid you live? And she said, \u201cWith my sister.\u201d (her sister was 11 and Yeonmi was\n9).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:22 They survived by\ngoing into the mountains and picking the grass and the flowers for their food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:38 Three years later\nher mother was released<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Park\u2019s mother told us\nprosecutors interrogated her on and off for about a year \u2013 sometimes at home in\nHyesan and sometimes elsewhere, because she had worked in her husband\u2019s trading\nbusiness. But, in a recent BBC radio interview, Park claimed her mother was\nimprisoned for six months\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/10/31/how-titantic-helped-this-brave-young-woman-escape-north-korea-s-totalitarian-state.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her mother was\ninterrogated and sent to prison for two years. Yeonmi, then nine, and her\n11-year-old sister, Eunmi, lived on their own during that time, eating rice,\ndragonflies, frogs, and grass to survive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0288zd0\n(BBC Radio interview October 17, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3:50 My mother went to\nprison for 6 months.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.com/news/world-south-asia-29809557<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Video (1:12) \u201cMy mom\nwas interrogated for two years and then she went to prison by breaking a law to\nmove.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q8: WAS YEONMI REALLY\nFORCED TO STRIP NAKED EVERY DAY (FOR MONTHS) WHILE SHE WAS AT A DETENTION\nCENTER IN MONGOLIA?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/10/31/how-titantic-helped-this-brave-young-woman-escape-north-korea-s-totalitarian-state.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi and her mother\nwere taken to a detention center in Ulan Bator, the capital of Mongolia, where\nYeonmi was forced to remove all of her clothes every day for months. \u201cI was a\nlittle girl and felt so ashamed. I kept thinking, Why do these people have the\nprivilege to control me like this? I\u2019m human too, but I wasn\u2019t treated like\none.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: In all of her other\nspeeches and interviews, Yeonmi never mentioned this. Her story seems to change\nand grow worse with each interview.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Professor Shi-eun Yu,\nwho worked as a counselor at the South Korean processing center for North\nKorean refugees, Hanawon, for two years in the early 2000s, and Professor Kim\nHyun-ah who worked there for five years in the mid 2000s both told us they had\nnever heard of anyone being stripped naked in a detention center in Mongolia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Yu, \u201cIn\nthe past, the South Korean government has sent counselors over to Mongolia to\nhelp North Korean defectors in detention\u2026 so how can defectors be stripped\nnaked everyday? It would cause them more psychological distress. It\u2019s not\npossible,\u201d she said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kim said that compared\nto other countries like Thailand and Russia, Mongolia is very supportive\ntowards North Korean defectors and that it\u2019s highly unlikely that defectors\nwould have been subjected to months of stripping.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: Yeonmi\u2019s story\nis not only wildly inconsistent, it also grows more horrific over time. New\ntales of sexual abuse are added as she becomes more famous. Suddenly, (in\nversion 2) her mother was raped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this article, Yeonmi\nwas forced to strip naked every day for months. Not surprisingly, her claim was\nrejected by experts with direct knowledge of defectors and their treatment in\nMongolian detention centers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q9: WHAT WAS THE\nFAMILY\u2019S PLAN AFTER YEONMI\u2019S SISTER SUDDENLY FLED ACROSS THE BORDER INTO CHINA?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/northkorea/11138496/Escape-from-North-Korea-How-I-escaped-horrors-of-life-under-Kim-Jong-il.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But before the family\ncould put its plan into action, Eunmi, Yeonmi\u2019s 16-year-old sister, fled across\nthe border with a friend without telling them. Terrified about how she might\nfare on her own, Yeonmi and her mother decided to follow her over the border\nand bring her home. Once reunited, the family would attempt a second escape\naltogether.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: It is\nextremely dangerous and risky for a North Korean to cross the border with\nChina. So Yeonmi and her mom supposedly decided to risk slipping into China\nwithout her father to find the sister (Eunmi) in China, then they were going to\nsneak Eunmi back across the border to North Korea, and then the whole family\nwas going to attempt to secretly cross the border again?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole family was\nalready committed to escaping before Eunmi abruptly fled by herself. Wouldn\u2019t\nthe father just go with Yeonmi and her mom into China to look for the missing\nsister (Eunmi)? That would only require the family to cross the border once,\ntogether.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That was Yeonmi\u2019s\noriginal story: \u201cI crossed the border with my mother and father together,\u201d\nbefore she started telling version 2 of her escape story (\u201cmy father wasn\u2019t\nwith us so my mother was raped\u201d).
