Her original story of the three family\nmembers crossing together makes much more sense, as the risk of capture or\nseparation would be greatly reduced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to version 2,\nthere were three planned border crossings -- greatly increasing the family\u2019s\nchances of being separated or captured by the authorities. It doesn\u2019t make a\nwhole lot of sense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q10: WHAT HAPPENED\nAFTER YEONMI AND HER FAMILY ESCAPED NORTH KOREA AND ARRIVED IN CHINA?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ZEmDpkz0g4<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The N. Korean TV Star\nStanding Up To Kim Jong-Un (mini-documentary about Yeonmi, featuring interviews\nwith Yeonmi and her mother)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(4:13) At just 16,\nEun-mi fled the country with a friend. Her family was devastated. Desperate to\nfind her sister, Yeon-mi and her parents walked across the mountains to the\nborder, where they bribed guards to cross the Tumen River to China. But there\nwas no sign of Eun-mi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4:35 (Yeonmi) \u201cWe\ncalled North Korea after we escaped. And they were saying the people were\ntrying to rape her (Yeonmi\u2019s sister). And she didn\u2019t say yes to them so they\nkilled her.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: So Yeonmi and\nher parents (she doesn\u2019t mention the rape story in this interview) went to\nChina to find her sister, Eunmi, who already fled across the border into China\nfour days earlier.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in China, Yeonmi\u2019s\nfamily called back into North Korea (where they had just come from), to ask\npeople where her sister was \u2026 and they were told that Eunmi was killed by some\npeople because she rejected their attempts to rape her?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(End of Part I)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Request: I hope Ms.\nPark will respond to at least some of these questions. I would ask her to\nrespond to them in the order they are posed on this document. I urge her not to\nsidestep any of these issues or mislead people with vague or dishonest\nresponses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PART II: YEONMI AND HER\nPROMOTER, CASEY LARTIGUE JR., RESPOND TO THE DIPLOMAT.COM ARTICLE. I RESPOND TO\nTHEM WITH FURTHER QUESTIONS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q11: WHY DIDN\u2019T PARK OR\nLARTIGUE RESPOND TO JOLLEY\u2019S CRITICISM OF YEONMI\u2019S VASTLY DIFFERENT ESCAPE\nSTORIES (QUESTION 1 ABOVE)? WHY DIDN\u2019T THEY RESPOND TO QUESTION 3, OR OTHER\nSERIOUS INCONSISTENCIES POINTED OUT BY JOLLEY?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q12: DID YEONMI WITNESS\nOR EXPERIENCE STARVATION/EATING GRASS TO SURVIVE IN NORTH KOREA? (question 2\nabove in Part I)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://koreatimes.co.kr/www/news/nation/2014/12/626_170000.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rushing to judgment on\na defector (Casey Lartigue\u2019s response to Yeonmi\u2019s criticism in the Diplomat.com\narticle)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By Casey Lartigue, Jr<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Jolley gets things\nhalf-right, she concludes the worst about Park. She cites an exchange during\nour podcast \"North Korea Today, featuring Casey and Yeonmi.\" We had\nbeen invited to do a special live podcast in front of an audience at an\nexhibition about North Korean street children. Park wanted to avoid\novershadowing the street children feature with her own story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jolley twists this to\neven question if Park had ever eaten grass or dragonflies because she didn't\nmention it then. We did a separate podcast in which Park talked in detail about\neating dragonflies, wild boar, grasshoppers, and sparrows when she was in North\nKorea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: This is a\ntotally misleading and disingenuous response. Lartigue misdirects and misleads\nthe reader by commenting about the podcast, when he clearly knows that\u2019s not\nthe point.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Refer to question two\nabove. Mary Ann Jolley pointed out that on a South Korean talk show in early\n2013 (long before Yeonmi became famous or made any podcasts with Lartigue),\nYeonmi said: \u201cI never saw anyone eating grass or bugs to survive in North\nKorea. I think other defectors who claim this are lying.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later, Yeonmi\u2019s story\ndrastically changed, and Yeonmi claimed that she even ate grass and bugs to\nsurvive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mr. Lartigue, why don\u2019t\nyou respond directly to this massive contradiction in Yeonmi\u2019s story?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q13: DID YEONMI REALLY\nSEE HER BEST FRIEND\u2019S MOM PUBLICLY EXECUTED IN 2002? (question 4 above)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UPDATE: A Response from\nYeonmi Park<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(December 2014,\nYeonmi\u2019s response to her criticism in the Diplomat article)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I never said that I saw\nexecutions in Hyesan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My friends\u2019 mother was\nexecuted in a small city in central North Korea where my mother still has\nrelatives (which is why I don\u2019t want to name it).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question 13A: (Check\nquotes below) Yeonmi said she grew up in Hyesan and then Pyongyang. Then, she\nmoved back to Hyesan (not some small city in central North Korea) after her\nfather\u2019s arrest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She also said it was\nher classmate\u2019s/best friend\u2019s mother who was publicly executed, and her whole\nschool had to attend the execution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So how can we believe\nthat Yeonmi\u2019s school and classmate/best friend were located in some small city\nin central North Korea? According to her quote below, she had moved back to\nHyesan, and she has never mentioned this small city in central North Korea\nuntil now.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uDXkdjx7VAE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I Am a North Korean\nMillennial - Yeonmi Park (July 10, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:26 In 2004, my whole\nworld came crashing down. My father, my hero was arrested for his illegal\ntrading business\u2026And because of that, I could not live in Pyongyang anymore, so\nI had to go back to Hyesan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: So she was\nindeed back in Hyesan, not some small city in central North Korea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: (In other\nversions of this story, Yeonmi said her father was arrested in 2002, when she\nwas 9.) The question is where she was before and after his arrest. Based on her\nquote above, before the arrest, she was living in Pyongyang. After the arrest,\nshe moved back to Hyesan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.theguardian.com/world/2014/aug/26/north-korea-defector-titanic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When she was nine years\nold, Park was forced to attend the execution of her classmate\u2019s mother. Her\ncrime? She had lent a South Korean movie to a friend. The townsfolk were\ngathered in a large stadium to watch the punishment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cShe got killed in\nfront of us,\u201d said Park, now 20 years-old. \u201cI was standing next to her daughter\n- my whole school had to go.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/one-young-world/why-is-the-world-allowing-a-holocaust-to-happen-again-brave-north-korean-shares-harrowing-story-of-escape-30673558.html\n(article based on an interview with Yeonmi)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When she was nine, she\nwas forced to watch her best friend's mother being executed on the street\nbefore her eyes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: Her school and\nbest friend would be in Pyongyang or Hyesan, where Yeonmi lived, not some small\ncity in central North Korea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUESTION 13B: (Check\nquotes below) How could Yeonmi suddenly arrive at a small city in central North\nKorea? (This is the first time she has ever mentioned it). After the father\u2019s\narrest in 2002, Yeonmi\u2019s mother said she was interrogated \u201cat home in Hyesan,\u201d\nmeaning they still lived in Hyesan, not some small city in central North Korea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also, Yeonmi said her\nmother was arrested for going to her hometown because North Korea has \u201cno\nfreedom of movement.\u201d So how did Yeonmi suddenly arrive in this small city in\ncentral North Korea to witness a public execution (of her best friend\u2019s mother,\nwhere Yeonmi\u2019s whole school had to attend)?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Park\u2019s mother told us\nprosecutors interrogated her on and off for about a year \u2013 sometimes at home in\nHyesan and sometimes elsewhere, because she had worked in her husband\u2019s trading\nbusiness. But, in a recent BBC radio interview, Park claimed her mother was\nimprisoned for six months because she went to live back in her hometown after\nher husband was jailed and \u201cbecause in North Korea there is no freedom of\nmovement, not freedom of speech\u2026 it was against the law for the movement and\nthat\u2019s why she went to prison for half a year.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUESTION 13C: (Check\nbelow for quotes) Yeonmi first lived in Hyesan until about age 5, and then\nstarted moving back and forth between Hyesan and Pyongyang (starting at age 5),\nwhen her father moved to Pyongyang in 1998.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But she also said she\nsaw public executions from ages 1-4. Can we believe this claim? And if so,\nwhere did she see them? They would\u2019ve been in Hyesan, where she was living\nbefore age 5, but she now claims she never saw executions in Hyesan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UPDATE: A Response from\nYeonmi Park (December 2014, Yeonmi\u2019s response to her criticism in the Diplomat\narticle)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I never said that I saw\nexecutions in Hyesan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0288zd0\n(Yeonmi\u2019s interview with BBC Radio: October 16, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1:50) I saw public\nexecutions since I was age 1, 2, 3, 4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q14: WHAT WERE THE\nCIRCUMSTANCES OF HER FATHER\u2019S BURIAL? (QUESTION 5 ABOVE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://koreatimes.co.kr/www/news/nation/2014/12/626_170000.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rushing to judgment on\na defector (Casey Lartigue\u2019s response to Yeonmi\u2019s criticism in the Diplomat.com\narticle)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By Casey Lartigue, Jr<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jolley even questions\ndetails about the burial of Park's father, but I know the story better than she\ndoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out of money, options\nand hope, with her father dying of cancer in China, Park and her mother agreed\nto be sold to a Chinese farmer. Park has mentioned such stories in speeches and\ninterviews and sought to raise awareness without \"sensationalizing\"\nbeing sold in China.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(The farmer) also\nagreed to dispose of the body of Park's father upon his death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: Now they were\nsold to a Chinese farmer? Another version of the story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the first we\nare hearing about this. I cannot find any speeches or interviews where Yeonmi\nmentioned her or mother being sold to a Chinese farmer. This seems to be\nanother lie heaped onto the rest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read Yeonmi\u2019s various\naccounts of her father\u2019s burial in Part I above. She either buried him alone,\nwith locals, or cremated him first and then buried the ashes with her mother.\nNone of the various versions include a farmer who purchased Yeonmi and her\nmother, and agreed to bury the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* And even if that were\ntrue, it doesn\u2019t negate her inconsistent accounts of the actual burial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q15: WHAT SHOULD WE\nBELIEVE ABOUT THE YEONMI PARK FOUNDATION? SHE HAD A WEBSITE WITH A PAYPAL\nDONATE BUTTON, EVEN THOUGH SHE DIDN\u2019T INDICATE HOW THE MONEY WOULD BE USED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND THEN, ONLY AFTER\nTHE DIPLOMAT ARTICLE CAME OUT, SHE APOLOGIZED FOR THE \u201cACCIDENTAL WEBSITE.\u201d \u2026\n\u201cIT WAS JUST A \u2018DUMMY SITE BUILT BY A FRIEND\u2019 THAT COULDN\u2019T REALLY ACCEPT\nMONEY.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi Park is backed\nby the American Libertarian non-profit organization, Atlas Foundation. She\u2019s\none of its Young Voices and has recently started her own foundation based in\nNew York \u2013 you can donate online through PayPal, but what exactly your money will\nbe used for is not clear. What is clear though, is that \u201cYeonmi is travelling\nand speaking in 2014\u201d and \u201cis available for international speeches.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UPDATE: A Response from\nYeonmi Park (December 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But one very important\nthing to correct:&nbsp; I do not have a\nfoundation.&nbsp; The website was a dummy site\nbuilt by a friend, and it was not supposed to be live. There was no way it could\naccept money, and I haven\u2019t taken any.&nbsp; I\nam so sorry for the confusion. The site has been taken down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: Since Yeonmi\nhas not commented publicly on how exactly she intends to help North Koreans in\nher own charitable endeavor, why was there even a website (or \u201cdummy site\u201d)\nwith a donate button to begin with?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: And does\nanyone honestly believe this claim about the dummy site? After Yeonmi became\nfamous, there was suddenly a Yeonmi Park foundation website with a PayPal\ndonate button even though she never stated how the money would be used or\nexactly what she would do to help North Koreans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I visited the website\nbefore it was taken down and I saw the PayPal donate button. It did not seem\nlike a dummy site to me.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PART III: ADDITIONAL\nQUESTIONS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* Request to Yeonmi: I\nhope you do not even respond to Part III unless you have already responded\nseparately to Part I and Part II questions. I only added Part III as further\nreference for others. I do not want it to distract from the much more important\nquestions in Parts I and II.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q16: DID YEONMI AND HER\nMOTHER REALLY WEAR THEIR MONGOLIAN PRISON UNIFORMS ONTO THE PLANE TO SEOUL?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ei-gGvLWOZI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">James Chau introducing\nYeonmi at the One Young World Summit in Dublin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5:40 (In Mongolia, you\nand your mother) were put into prison for 3 months\u2026and through that,\neventually, you found yourselves wearing prison clothes coming off a plane in\nSouth Korea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/northkorea/11138496/Escape-from-North-Korea-How-I-escaped-horrors-of-life-under-Kim-Jong-il.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeonmi and her mother\nwere taken into custody and after 15 days were transferred to a detention\ncentre in Ulan Bator, the Mongolian capital. Several weeks later they were\nhanded over to South Korean officials and on April 1 2009\u2026Yeonmi stood at Ulan\nBator\u2019s Chinggis Khaan airport preparing to board a plane for Seoul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A few hours later the\nplane touched down at Incheon airport in Seoul. Yeonmi stepped off the\npassenger jet wearing a shabby prison uniform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: So the\ndetention center in Mongolia did not give Yeonmi or her mom their original\nclothes back, and instead released them while they were wearing their prison\nuniforms?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And after Yeonmi and\nher mom were released into the custody of South Korean officials in Mongolia,\nthose South Korean officials saw Yeonmi and her mom wearing prison uniforms,\nbut the officials did not even give them some cheap clothes to change into?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The South Korean\nofficials actually put Yeonmi and her mom on a plane to South Korea in prison\nuniforms?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://thediplomat.com/2014/12/the-strange-tale-of-yeonmi-park/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kim said that compared\nto other countries like Thailand and Russia, Mongolia is very supportive\ntowards North Korean defectors\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: Remember that\nYeonmi also claimed to be forced to strip naked every day for months while in\nthe detention center in Mongolia, which two South Korean experts rejected. She\nkeeps adding these details to make an epic story (\u201cforced to strip naked every\nday for months, then walked off the plane in South Korea still wearing her\nprison uniform). But if you actually just take a step back and think about what\nshe's saying, in many instances, it's totally ridiculous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q17: WHERE DID YEONMI\nSEE PUBLIC EXECUTIONS?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/one-young-world/crouching-tiger-hidden-dragon-one-young-worlds-dramatic-curtainraiser-30674883.html\n(embedded video interview with Yeonmi)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5:15 (Public\nexecutions) are like big celebrations for North Koreans, because we are killing\nour betrayers and criminals. So they are taken to the big stadium. And we are\ngoing there to do the celebrate things. And in the big stadium or in the\nmarkets, where lots of people are coming, they are doing it (public\nexecutions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: Does North\nKorea really execute people in public markets? I don\u2019t doubt that North Korea\nexecutes people publicly. But I doubt they do it in the markets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q18: WAS YEONMI FORCED\nTO SELL GOODS IN THE MARKET AT AGE 6 OR 7 TO SURVIVE THE 1995-2000 FAMINE? (SHE\nSAID HER FAMILY WAS RELATIVELY WELL-OFF UNTIL 2002).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.abc.net.au/news/2014-07-28/north-korea-black-markets/5629736<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inside the black market\nof the world's most repressive regime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She says during the\ndevastating famines of the 1990s she was forced to barter and trade. Her\nparents encouraged her to do so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Making a profit, no\nmatter how small, was the only way to survive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I wanted to make\nmoney by myself so I just bribed the old charter guard ... and I brought some\nfood from the orchard. And I sold it,\" she said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"So that means, I\nknew I had to make money and had to make a profit.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: Yeonmi was born\nin 1993, so she was at most six or seven years old during the famine. So this\nsix or seven year old girl was supposedly bribing guards and selling goods in\nthe market to survive, even though her mom said in question two above:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cOthers couldn\u2019t afford\nto eat white rice. But Yeonmi only ate white rice. Her father did his best to\ngive his kids a better life, so\u2026the kids didn\u2019t know the truth about what was\ngoing on in North Korea.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: Yeonmi\u2019s story\nabout bribing and selling during the famine seems contrived. It fits well with\nher speeches about the \u201cblack market generation,\u201d which is of course important\nfor her and other defectors to talk about. But Yeonmi and her mom both stated\nthat the father gave them a good life until his arrest in 2002 (years after the\nfamine).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the story of six or\nseven year old Yeonmi being forced to bribe guards and sell things in the\nmarket to survive the famine just doesn\u2019t seem believable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in the next quote\n(below), she claims it wasn\u2019t until about age 10 (2003), after the famine, that\nshe first started selling things in the market.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.cnbc.com/id/102146454#<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How millennials are\nshaking North Korea\u2019s regime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When she was about 10,\nshe first dabbled in capitalism by bribing orchard guards with alcohol to give\nher a bucket of persimmons, which she then sold in the markets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Q19: COULD YEONMI\nREALLY SMELL COOKING FROM CHINA ACROSS THE RIVER IN HYESAN?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uDXkdjx7VAE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I Am a North Korean\nMillennial - Yeonmi Park (July 10, 2014)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">0:18 (In Hyesan)\nOccasionally I could even smell very like fatty oily delicious noodles cooking\nfrom China.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0288zd0<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(After being asked by\nthe BBC Radio host about her family\u2019s decision to escape)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6:15 (Yeonmi) I could\nsee the lights from China and sometimes I could smell the delicious smell of\ncooking from China.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So we just thought, if\nwe go there, we can live like them, so that was the very simple reason.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Question: Look at a map\nof the North Korea-China border near Hyesan. A river divides the two countries,\nand you have to walk for a little while from the riverbank to the nearest home\nor restaurant in China. Could Yeonmi have honestly smelled noodles cooking from\nthat far away?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think about your own\nneighborhood, and think about how far away you have ever smelled something else\ncooking. Then look at the map of the China-North Korean border near Hyesan. I'd\nreally like to know if other defectors from Hyesan could ever smell noodles (or\nanything) cooking from across the border in China. I know it's a minor point,\nbut a bizarre lie if it's not possible to smell food across the border.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; So I stayed at home and\nhelped my mom\u2026(we could) only eat two meals in a day\u2026. But compared to other\n\u201ckkotjebis\u201d (child beggars) it was nothing. They were literally scraping on the\nstreets\u2026they are just eating everything\u2026it\u2019s really just heartbreaking to see\nthem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comment: Yeonmi and her\nmom both acknowledge that the father gave their family a relatively good life\nuntil his arrest in 2002. After Yeonmi\u2019s father went to prison, there are\nseveral different versions of what happened:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a. The mother also went\nto prison, so Yeonmi went to live with her aunt and the sister lived separately\nwith an uncle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">b. Yeonmi stayed home\nand helped her mom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">c. The mother also went\nto prison, so Yeonmi and her sister lived alone and ate grass/bugs on the\nmountain to survive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;
