, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.euractiv.com/section/euro-finance/news/eu-carbon-market-fraudsters-face-heavy-jail-sentences/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">VERY RARELY DO\nROTHSCHILDs BANKS GET CAUGHT</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.thisismoney.co.uk/money/markets/article-3625388/RBS-sued-145m-alleged-role-huge-carbon-trading-VAT-fraud.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.thisismoney.co.uk/money/markets/article-3625388/RBS-sued-145m-alleged-role-huge-carbon-trading-VAT-fraud.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the Panama Papers\nexposed how opaque shell companies can be used to conceal ill-gotten gains or\navoid tax, several countries including Japan, Israel, Bulgaria and France have\nlargely made their company databases freely available, while Britain became the\nfirst country globally to provide free access to data showing real company\nowners, rather than their nominees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panama Papers\nshowed Hong Kong was the most active centre in the world for the creation of\nshell companies. In response, Hong Kong quietly pushed through proposals on anti-money\nlaundering laws and company disclosure legislation, including a requirement\nthat companies reveal the identity of their true owners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in Hong Kong, home\nto more than 1.3 million private companies, access to the information comes at\na cost.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corporate registry fees\nmake it VERY expensive to conduct investigations into potential crimes amid\nincreasingly complex corporate structures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For larger investigations where a\ncompany may have hundreds of SHELL subsidiaries or associated companies, the\nprocess can be prohibitively expensive\u2014DELIBERATELY so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world\u2019s largest KOSHER\nbanks want to do less to stop drug lords, tax cheats, and terrorists from\nmoving money through their institutions \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since banks, perform\nbanking transactions, they are uniquely positioned to detect when a drug lord\nor a sketchy hedge fund is trying to wash illicit money through legitimate channels.\nWhen transactions are larger than $5,000, or have hallmarks of terrorist\nfinancing, tax evasion, or money laundering, they must file a suspicious\nactivity report (SAR) and deliver them to federal regulators.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;This provides raw\ndata for law enforcement to connect the dots on criminal activity. &nbsp;&nbsp;In a SAR, the subject of the transaction\u2019s\npersonal information, the date of the transaction, the name of the bank where\nit occurred and its contact information, and a written description of the\nactivity. It is so easy to make it yet banks don\u2019t do it. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;There are &nbsp;fines against Raymond James, &nbsp;Credit Suisse, Deutsche Bank, &nbsp;Taiwanese firm Mega Bank etc. All of those\nwere within the past nine months. &nbsp;&nbsp;For\nallowing the Sinaloa drug cartel and terrorist financiers to launder illegal\ncash for a decade, HSBC infamously paid $1.9 billion\u2014but their compliance\nsystem remains so weak that the British Financial Conduct Authority opened an \u201cwool\nover the eyes\u201d &nbsp;investigation&nbsp; .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Banks are truly terrible at anti\u2013money\nlaundering compliance.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>They\u2019re fined for compliance failures all the time.&nbsp; Banks don\u2019t care because there are NO jail\nterms. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>Kosher banks do NOT care for\nfines</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kosher banks &nbsp;don\u2019t like following the rules if it means\ncutting off business with less than reputable clients that can earn them lots\nand lots of money. This is how the terrorist bank BCCI flourished for so long.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE WHITE MAN WILL\nALWAYS TRY TO RUN DOWN THIRD WORLD BUSINESS MEN \u2013</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THEY WILL NEVER SAY A WORD\nAGAINST WHITE JEWS ESPECIALLY IF THEY ARE PART OF BILDERBERG CLUB</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.marineconservation.org.au/data/pdf/The_Adani_Brief_by_Environmental_Justice_Australia.pdf\">https://www.marineconservation.org.au/data/pdf/The_Adani_Brief_by_Environmental_Justice_Australia.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Panama Papers\nrevelations, the European Commission has not shown much interest in taking\nstrong and exemplary action on tax evasion and avoidance. They apparently have\na KOSHER avoidance filter..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With up to 1.6 USD\ntrillion USD lost from the real economy each year, they need to be honest to\nthemselves , transparent and &nbsp;bolder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The European Commission\u2019s\nstance on whistleblowing is suspect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the verdict in the\nLuxembourg Leaks trial demonstrates, even award-winning whistleblowers can face\ncriminal prosecution - some reward for publicising political and corporate\ncollusion in tax dodging.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Commission proposes nothing beyond monitoring\nnational legislation. This is not good enough\u2014<span style=\"background-color: white;\">we know why the POOJANIYA\nCommissions kosher &nbsp;hands are tied</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A public register of\nbeneficial owners for companies and business-type trusts must be created . This\nshould put an end to shell companies used to dodge taxes because citizens will\nbe able to access information on who are the persons behind each company\ncreated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the Panama Papers demonstrated, banks and intermediaries have found\nways to circumvent money-laundering obligations in the past. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>INDIA WILL CONTINUE\nBURNING COAL\u2014WHETHER JEW ROTHSCHILD LIKES IT OR NOT !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read all 6 parts of the\npost below--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/post-note-ban-rs-35000-crore-cash-stash-flooded-mp-banks/articleshow/57611278.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/post-note-ban-rs-35000-crore-cash-stash-flooded-mp-banks/articleshow/57611278.cms</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bogus capital gains of\nRs 82,000 crore have been availed by shell companies last year . The &nbsp;Budget 2017-18 has proposed 10 per cent\nlong-term capital gains tax on those who acquired shares in unlisted companies\nafter October 1, 2004, if they had not paid securities transaction tax (STT) at\nthe time of purchase.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8709771883270525506\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration: none;\">March 14, 2017 at 7:52 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain and all readers,<br />\n<br />\nCheck this out -<br />\n<br />\nTheViralFever (TVF) CEO accused of Sexual Harrasment by multiple women !<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/tvf-founder-ceo-accused-of-sexual-harassment-by-multiple-women-2149897.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://mumbaimirror.indiatimes.com/mumbai/cover-story/tvf-boss-labels-sex-abuse-charges-fake-challenges-victim-to-file-a-police-case/articleshow/57623657.cms<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.ndtv.com/india-news/tvf-boss-arunabh-kumar-defends-himself-after-more-women-accuse-him-of-molestation-1669426<br />\n<br />\n-------------------------<br />\n<br />\nThe victim and many other women have shared their experience on this blog -<br />\n<br />\nhttps://medium.com/@Indian.fowler/the-indian-uber-that-is-tvf-37f9cb73df31#.l00glzg5q<br />\n----------------------------------------------</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_28BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/regime-change-in-north-korea-rare.html?showComment=1489510697991#c4946482516304630349\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 14, 2017 at 10:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE KNOW THE DESH DROHI POLITICIANS WHO HAVE ALLOWED TIGER GLOBAL INVESTMENTS A DRIVERS SEAT IN INDIA</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW THE KICKBACKS THESE INDIAN TRAITORS GOT<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://www.vccircle.com/news/alternative-investment/2016/09/12/why-tiger-global-crouching-india</span><br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WATCH<br />\n<br />\nKalyan Krishnamurthy the current CEO of Flipkart served as the Managing Director and Director of Finance and Portfolio Companies at Tiger Global Management LLC<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://www.livemint.com/Opinion/9jYZyiFhhTSMksYebC62WK/Flipkart-Tiger-Globals-unlikely-burden.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH !</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8700941590443084053\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_5M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/ibs-irritable-bowel-syndrome-vagus_14.html?showComment=1489566938719#c8700941590443084053\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 15, 2017 at 2:05 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n######### WOMB OF MODERN ECONOMICS #############<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=apco3D5B_7A</span><br />\n<br />\nBIG DADDY !<br />\n<br />\nShort selling is the practice of selling securities or other financial instruments that are not currently owned (usually borrowed), and subsequently repurchasing them .<br />\n<br />\nIn the event of an interim price decline, the short seller profits, since the cost of RE purchase is less than the proceeds received upon the initial SHORT sale.<br />\n<br />\nConversely, the short position closes out at a loss if the price of a shorted instrument rises prior to repurchase.<br />\n<br />\n. Speculators may sell short hoping to realize a profit on an instrument that appears overvalued, just as long investors or speculators hope to profit from a rise in the price of an instrument that appears undervalued. Traders or fund managers may hedge a long position or a portfolio through one or more short positions.<br />\n<br />\nIn contrast to a traditional merchant who starts out to \"buy low, sell high\", a short-seller starts out to \"sell high, buy low\", or even to \"buy high, sell low\" when this buy is in fact \"on tick\".<br />\n<br />\nJEW Isaac Le Maire ( Dutch East India Company spice trade from Kerala ) is the FATHER of short selling<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe world\u2019s first stock market, called \u201cBourse\u201d opened in Antwerp in 1531 monopolised by Jews. The hottest item of trade was spices from Kerala ( Calicut king ships to Salala/ Aden ) and then by Arab camel caravans , ships of the desert to ( Beirut/ Constantinople ) and then further from there on Jewish owned ships to Europe<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</span><br />\n<br />\nNAZI is lifted from NASI.<br />\n<br />\nWith the high concentration of Jews and their centuries of experience about financial issues, this trading in money itself took off like a rocket.<br />\n<br />\nNearly every aspect of what we call modern financing, from \u201cforward\u201d contracts, \u201coption\u201d contracts, \u201cstocks\u201d, \u201csecurities\u201d, commodities trading and even \u201csovereign bonds\u201d were created here.<br />\n<br />\nThese rules and regulations were all LIFTED from ancient Kerala king\u2019s customs trading post commercial rules at Mecca oasis and Salala/ Aden. These rules were again lifted from the rules of Manu, the planet\u2019s first law giver.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/manu-first-law-maker-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nFor example, the Spanish government had something called juros (link in Spanish), a kind of sovereign or treasury bond. The government would essentially sell someone a piece of paper for a sum of money, with the promise to pay the money back at a later date with interest.<br />\n<br />\nThese juros themselves were traded at the Antwerp bourse, with people buying and selling them in between themselves independent of the Spanish government.<br />\n<br />\nWith relative ease at which large amounts of money could be raised at the bourse, the fundamental aspects of capitalism had great appeal to monarchs and powerful men at the time.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1565 Jew Thomas Gresham founded the Royal Exchange in the City of London which is still active<br />\n<br />\nBut even with all of the sophisticated terms and contracts and different ways of trading things, from \u201cshorts\u201d to \u201clongs\u201d to \u201cfutures\u201d and \u201coptions\u201d and all the rest, this still wasn\u2019t quite capitalism.<br />\n<br />\nWhat was happening in the Antwerp bourse was a kind of sophisticated form of KOSHER gambling.<br />\n<br />\nI bet you X dollars that the price of pepper will go down, you bet the opposite, and one of us ends up winning and making money.<br />\n<br />\nEven the floating of sovereign debt was a kind of gambling, wherein you lend money to royalty today, taking the gamble that through conquests or winning wars (or whatever else), they\u2019ll be able to pay you back more money in the future.<br />\n<br />\nCapitalism was founded by a JEW named Isaac Le Maire.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_5BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seedKx_YD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_3T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seedKx_YD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_3TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_3TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_3TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seedKx_YD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_3TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_3TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seedKx_YD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_3TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_3TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_3TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_5b+seedKx_YD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4758126732462701071\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/ibs-irritable-bowel-syndrome-vagus_14.html?showComment=1489567010431#c4758126732462701071\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 15, 2017 at 2:06 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_3MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nOriginally a wealthy Calicut spice grocer in Antwerp, in 1585 Spanish troops destroyed much of the town (including the bourse) and so Isaac Le Maire as well as the financial \u201caction\u201d of the bourse along with the Jews moved to Amsterdam.<br />\n<br />\nDutch East India Company was the first company in history to actually issue bonds and shares of stock to the general public. The VOC was officially the first publicly traded company of the planet, because it was the first company to be ever actually listed on an official stock exchange.<br />\n<br />\nAs the first historical model of the quasi-fictional concept of mega-corporations, the VOC possessed quasi-governmental powers, including the ability to wage war, imprison and execute convicts, negotiate treaties, strike its own coins, and establish colonies<br />\n<br />\nA new bourse was created there as well as the first multinational corporation in history, the Vereenigde Oost-Indische Compagnie (VOC), known in English as the \u201cUnited East India Company\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nThe VOC was a trading company, given an exclusive monopoly (by the newly independent Dutch government) to valuable Malabar spices of Calicut King and other imported treasures like diamonds<br />\nBesides all the older \u201caction\u201d on the Antwerp bourse, there was an extremely brisk trade in selling and buying of VOC stocks in the Amsterdam bourse. Extremely complicated strategies on how to trade these stocks soon arose, later detailed in a book (written in Spanish) called Confusi\u00f3n de confusions.<br />\n<br />\nFor the first time ever, ordinary people could make a living solely off the profit from trading financial instruments of one kind or another.<br />\n<br />\nJEW Isaac Le Maire was the largest shareholder (owner of stock) of the VOC when it was created in 1602. As a result of his dominant position, he became the \u201cgovernor\u201d of the VOC, in effect the world\u2019s first CEO.<br />\n<br />\nWhether true or not, other large shareholders became convinced that JEW Le Maire was embezzling funds and so had him expelled from the company by 1605. Pissed off at the loss of so much (potential) profit, he decided to get his revenge on the company using a unique financial strategy.<br />\n<br />\nHe and other corrupt Jews founded a company (what would now be called a \u201cdummy corporation\u201d) to secretly trade in VOC shares in an effort both to make money as well as to destroy the VOC\u2019s profitability by driving down the share prices. Le Maire used a unique form of trade called the SHORT SELLING<br />\n<br />\nIn essence, he sold something he did not own (shares in the company) to someone based on the premise that he would buy those things in the future when they would (hopefully for Le Maire\u2019s purposes) be cheaper than they are today.<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, he sold people the promise to buy something in the future (VOC stock). It is a a kind of gamble or wager because if the future price of stock is higher then Le Maire now owes the other person money. But for the first time in history, people were now selling things that they did not own .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS MAKING KOSHER MONEY FROM THIN AIR\u2014NOW BEING TRANSLATED EVEN FURTHER TO CARBON CREDITS AND OFFSETS.<br />\n<br />\nNaked means that even their promises were unsecured and making a profit off of them.<br />\n<br />\nUsing machinations involving the French government, Le Maire indeed did conspire to lower the (future) price of VOC stock. If he had succeeded, he would have profited enormously without having to own (or buy) anything in the first place.<br />\n<br />\nIn Jew Le Maire\u2019s case, his strategy backfired as the price of VOC stock went up and suddenly a lot of people were waiting for payment (in stocks) that Le Maire simply could not afford to buy.<br />\n<br />\nAs a result, the Dutch government banned short selling (for a brief time, and then it was reinstated, a cycle that continues in modern economies today).<br />\n<br />\nWhat distinguishes Rothschild\u2019s capitalism from sophisticated forms of gambling is the premise that something can be created from nothing. Rothschild owned all trade unions ( TO CONTROL THE OPPOSITION, LEAD THEM YOURSELF ) \u2013he could influence the outcome of any business dealing or commercial venture<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_3MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_3BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_3B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_4B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c443014848760354831\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_4M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/ibs-irritable-bowel-syndrome-vagus_14.html?showComment=1489567039962#c443014848760354831\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 15, 2017 at 2:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nUnlike older forms of trading where either commodities or goods or services (or the promise thereof) were involved, now certain transactions could be done based on nothing but promises alone. Le Maire was the first to do SHORT SELLING in a big way.<br />\n<br />\nDue to geopolitical and religious reasons, a royal from Holland, William of Orange took over the kingship of England, Scotland and Ireland (modern Britain) in the year 1688. Not only was this an act that spurred Britain to become firmly PROTESTANT but it also firmly entrenched the Kosher Dutch ways of capitalism, trade and financing<br />\n<br />\nAll economies today are based on two things. One is the elaborately constructed form of unsecured promises, in which monopoly corporations (banks) create money on their word alone.<br />\n<br />\nThe second part is extremely elaborate and sophisticated trading in these promises, now reaching ever higher levels of the absurd in which computer programs interact with each other based on extremely complicated mathematic formulas.<br />\n<br />\nECONOMICS IS CREATED AND TWEAKED DAY AFTER DAY TO SUIT JEW ROTHSHID TODAY.. EVEN THE TOP ECONOMISTS LIKE AMARTYA SEN HAVE NO IDEA OF ASSHOLE FROM ELBOW<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIt is this BAFFLING WITH BULLSHIT using a combination of mathematics and monopoly control of promises that has led to what we call MODERN ECONOMICS. Another way to say it is that debt (future unsecured promises) and the trading thereof is now the sole source of \u201cwealth\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nThe way all of the very richest people and corporations in the world \u201cearn\u201d their wealth is by sophisticated manipulation of these unsecured promises.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE REASON WHY JEWS HAVE AN INNER KOSHER CLUB AT BILDERBERG CLUB. They like to be on the same kosher page.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThrough hegemonic control of monopoly entities who granted themselves exclusive control of money itself, they are in essence doing nothing more than pushing a few buttons on a computer, transferring empty promises in exchange for real goods, services and commodities.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/great-american-depression-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEven if every single possible resource was \u201cliquidated\u201d and turned into cash, it still would not be enough money to pay back all of the debts owed to Jew Rothschild\u2019s banks worldwide. The only reason the system continues to exist is because ever more distant future promises are being sold and traded.<br />\n<br />\nNow Rothschild wants to sell 100 year bonds from his British banks for this very purpose.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.telegraph.co.uk/business/2016/04/15/a-century-bond-just-think-what-can-happen-in-100-years/<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seedKx_YD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seedKx_YD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/ed-arrests-hong-kong-based-indian-woman-in-rs-1478-crore-laundering-case/story-h6SguPP8XoijtO0vTMI8QJ.html\">http://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/ed-arrests-hong-kong-based-indian-woman-in-rs-1478-crore-laundering-case/story-h6SguPP8XoijtO0vTMI8QJ.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; WHY GIVE THE CHILD BAD KARMA<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />WHATEVER RAMANI IS HAS WRITTEN ON HIS OWN ABOUT SANATANA DHARMA IS PURE BULLSHIT -- AND THIS BOTHERS ME&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 17, BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_16.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_16.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dahTmq1wiqI/WMNRPZauT3I/AAAAAAABRkQ/8UJLATg43BMYe0O5-3l9g-1WtCMbstmbACLcB/s1600/20170206_104535_resized.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dahTmq1wiqI/WMNRPZauT3I/AAAAAAABRkQ/8UJLATg43BMYe0O5-3l9g-1WtCMbstmbACLcB/s640/20170206_104535_resized.jpg\" width=\"214\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "135", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2178880548986040723/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8022843086764015434", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-03-09T19:44:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-03-11T06:54:06+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDg5MTk1NDQ2MzczCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_9.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8022843086764015434", "title": "SHELL COMPANIES for money laundering, tax evasion, hiding kickbacks, layering PART 15 -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 14, BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_8.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_8.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any financial\ninstitution, payment system, or medium of exchange has the potential to be\nexploited for money laundering or terrorist financing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The potential money\nlaundering risks are significantly reduced by anti-money laundering regulation,\nfinancial supervision, examination, and enforcement. The risks that remain,\nincluding those that are unavoidable, are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Widespread use of\ncash, making it difficult for authorities to differentiate between licit and\nillicit use and movement of bank notes;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Structured\ntransactions below applicable thresholds to avoid reporting and recordkeeping\nobligations;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Individuals and\nentities that disguise the nature, purpose, ownership, and control of accounts;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Occasional AML\ncompliance deficiencies, which are an inevitable consequence of a financial<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">system with hundreds of\nthousands of locations for financial services;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Complicit violators\nwithin financial institutions; and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Complicit merchants,\nparticularly wholesalers who facilitate TBML, and financial services providers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminals use every feasible\nmoney laundering method available to them, exploiting opportunities wherever\nthey find them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means that in practice, different money laundering methods\nare used simultaneously or sequentially, or are alternated in response to\nactions taken by law enforcement and financial supervisors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The continuously\nshifting and opportunistic focus of money launderers makes it difficult and\npotentially misleading to attempt to rank order financial services or sectors\non the basis of money laundering risk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money Laundering Risk\nAssessment (NMLRA) of USA identifies the money laundering risks<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of the\nNMLRA is to help the public and private sectors recognize and understand the\nmoney laundering methods used, the effectiveness of current efforts to address\nthe threats and vulnerabilities that create money laundering opportunities, and\nthe residual risk to the financial system and national security.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NMLRA updates and\nexpands the National Money Laundering Threat Assessment (MLTA) of&nbsp; USA by:<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Consolidating\ninformation from agency-specific, Congressional, and White House sources published\nsince 2006;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Identifying case\nexamples and trends from approximately 5,000 money laundering-related federal prosecutions\n(2006-2011);<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Drawing from the\nwork of the interagency Task Force on the U.S. Anti-Money Laundering Framework\nand the Securities and Derivatives Markets Working Group, which have identified\nillicit financing threats, trends, and risks in the United States; and --\nIdentifying priority money laundering risks.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not\nall prosecutions for financial crimes include a money laundering or related\ncharge, so the indictments and other court documents reviewed are not\nnecessarily representative of all financial crime prosecutions.<o:p></o:p></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Vulnerability: This\nis what facilitates or creates the opportunity for money laundering. It may relate\nto a specific financial sector or product, or a weakness in regulation,\nsupervision, or enforcement, or reflect unique circumstances in which it may be\ndifficult to distinguish legal from illegal activity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Not all money laundering methods have equal\nconsequences. The methods that allow for the most amount of money to be\nlaundered most effectively or most quickly present the greatest potential\nconsequences.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Risk: Risk is a\nfunction of threat, vulnerability, and consequence. It represents a summary judgment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>AT SEA , I WAS A VERY SUCCESSFUL CAPTAIN ONLY\nBECAUSE I DID DYNAMIC RISK ASSESSMENT, GOT IT SIGNED AND FILED IT <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE INITIAL RISK ASSESSMENT WAS FOR COMING\nSHADOWS.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I MADE MY OWN RISK ASSESSMENT FORM <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>MY BOSSES TOLD ME TO STOP IT\u2014AS IT IS NOT IN\nTHE ISO CERTIFICATION PAPER WORK LIST OF THE COMPANY<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I TOLD THEM TO FUCK OFF<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>MY SHIPS GOT PROPER SPARE PARTS \u2013 BY BOSSES\nSHAT IN THEIR PANTS , JUST THINKG WHAT COULD HAPPEN TO THEM , IF THERE IS A\nSERIOUS ACCIDENT AT SEA, DUE TO THEM IGNORING MY RISK ASSESSMENT<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>I LITERALLY HAD THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS IN MY\nVICE\u2014WHICH I TIGHTENED OR LOOSENED AT WILL.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NOW YOU KNOW WHY MY SHORE BOSSES CELEBRATED AND GOT\nDRUNK WHEN I LEFT THE COMPANY ..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I HAVE HARDCORE FANS ASHORE, &nbsp;I GET FEEDBACK.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact-finding and\nassessment process ( MONEY LAUNDERING ) involved:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Identifying the\nnature and volume of predicate financial crime in the United States to\ndetermine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the source of domestic\nillicit proceeds;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Tallying the money\nlaundering methods identified through civil and criminal investigations and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">criminal prosecutions;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Assessing the\ndeterrent effect of domestic regulation, supervision, and enforcement on\npotential<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">money laundering\nmethods; and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Using the foregoing\nresearch and analysis to identify residual money laundering risks in the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SIM Cloning. --Since\nthe time OTP became mandatory for banking and card transactions, SIM card\ncloning has mushroomed. The fraudster first gets hold of your account details\nand an identity proof to get a duplicate SIM. Then he requests for a new SIM\nfrom the mobile service operator on some pretext and gets the targeted\nindividual's original SIM deactivated. Once the new SIM gets activated, he can\ntransact using OTP authorisations. And, by the time the victim realises, his\naccount is wiped clean.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Card Fraud.-- Card\nfrauds can be either offline or online, i.e., through skimming (ATM\ntransactions) or vishing (online fraud). And, with 336 million debit card and\n19 million credit card holders and 0.2 million ATM users, and debit card and\ncredit transactions are Rs7,000 crore and Rs12,000 crore per month,\nrespectively, the opportunity for fraudsters is huge.The irony is that,\nmost often, card frauds happen due to the carelessness of card owners<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishing. --Since the\nemergence of e-commerce, vishing has increased rampantly. Experts say most of\nthe money defrauded through vishing is used for shopping on international\nwebsites where OTP is not required. And, there is a clear pattern in which\ngullible individuals are defrauded. Scamsters often dial an individual between\n11am to 2pm, when people are usually busy at work, posing as bank\nrepresentatives and weave a web of deceit to extract card details. Investigators\nsay the following are the most common approach.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your card has been\ntemporarily blocked and may be blocked permanently if you do not provide the\nrequired details. There is always a sense of urgency, an effort to catch the\nindividual off-guard and scare him into revealing the details. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your reward points are\nabout to expire. In order to redeem either in cash or gifts, please provide the\ncard details as a part of the verification process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your current card is\nnot an EMV (chip-based) card and the bank is in the process of phasing out\nmagnetic strip cards. To place a request for a new card, please provide your\ncard details for verification.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And finally, the most\npleasant bait!</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your card number has\nbeen selected for a free holiday package. As a part of authentication, please\nprovide us with the card details.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Identity thieves who\nobtain a legitimate taxpayer\u2019s name and Social Security number can file a\nfraudulent claim for a tax refund early in the filing season before the\nlegitimate taxpayer files.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Income tax refunds can be paid by paper check or\nelectronically either via direct deposit to a bank account or to a prepaid\ndebit card.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminals can open\nprepaid debit card accounts online using stolen identity information, and then\ncash out a fraudulent tax refund at an ATM. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mortgage fraud results\nin an estimated&nbsp; $6 billion in annual\nlosses in the United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mortgage fraud schemes\ncontain some material misstatement, misrepresentation, or omission that is\nrelied on by an underwriter or lender to fund, purchase, or insure a loan.\nMortgage fraud can be used to generate illicit profits or to qualify for\nhousing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Drug traffickers and others who rely on an\nillicit cash income use mortgage fraud to acquire property. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term securities\nfraud covers a wide range of illegal activities including, among others,\naffinity fraud, high yield investment programs, microcap fraud, Ponzi schemes,\npre-initial public offering investment scams, pyramid schemes, insider trading,\nmarket manipulation, and pump and dump schemes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Securities accounts can\nbe used to originate illicit proceeds through the implementation of these\nfraudulent securities trading practices. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Securities fraud is the\nmost common predicate crime for criminal money laundering cases involving\ntransactions through broker-dealers. The proceeds of drug trafficking and other\ncrimes sometimes find their way into brokerage accounts at the layering stage\nmore than at the placement stage<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most identified cases\nof illicit activity in the securities markets relate to some form of fraud,\nincluding securities fraud, identity theft, or embezzlement. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FBI estimates that 1.4\nmillion people belong to 33,000 violent street gangs, motorcycle gangs, and\nprison gangs in the United States. Gangs are engaged in robbery, drug and gun\ntrafficking, fraud, extortion, and prostitution rings.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The number of people\nstarting to use heroin has been steadily rising , which may reflect a shift\naway from abuse of prescription pain relievers to a similar, easier to obtain,\nand cheaper alternative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite its recent\nsurge in popularity, heroin remains one of the least used illegal drugs in the\nUnited States with around one percent of the population having tried it. The\nU.S. heroin market is supplied entirely from foreign sources, with more than\nhalf of the supply coming from Mexico.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The increase in Mexican heroin production\ncoincides with a decrease in production in Colombia. U.S. retail expenditure on\nheroin is estimated to be $20 billion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">National Money\nLaundering Risk Assessment can be particularly susceptible to criminal\ninfluences. That Strategy cites a World Bank estimate of about $1 trillion\nspent annually on bribery of public officials, causing an array of economic distortions\nand damage to legitimate economic activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The&nbsp;\ndrug mafia uses cash. Payouts related to fraud, extortion, and other\ncriminal activities are generally made in cash. Mafia members will store up to\nseveral million dollars in cash rather than place the money in a bank.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Nigerian criminal enterprises are among the\nmost aggressive and expansionist of the international criminal groups. The\nNigerian groups are infamous for their financial frauds, which cost the United\nStates an estimated &nbsp;$2 billion annually. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN GOA THE DRUG LORDS\nCONVERTED THE CASH DURING THE DEMONETIZATION PROCESS IN CONNIVANCE WITH\nFOREIGN&nbsp; JEWISH BANKS\u2014 THE GOVT DOES NOT\nEVEN KNOW</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/jewish-russian-mafia-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/jewish-russian-mafia-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schemes are diverse,\ntargeting individuals, businesses, and government offices. Examples include: --\nAdvance fee (or 419) fraud which typically involves a person claiming to have\naccess to a large amount of money that they are willing to share in return for\nhelp transferring or depositing the funds.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The victim is asked for money to pay\ninitial fees. After the money is transferred, the benefactor disappears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Online dating scams,\nwhich involve taking advantage of individuals who are led to believe a serious\nrelationship is developing. The victim may be asked for money to pay for travel\nin order to meet, or for a health emergency. Once the money is transferred the\nparamour disappears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alternatively, the\nvictim may be asked to perform some activity that helps to support another criminal\nscheme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Check cashing/funds\ntransfer fraud, which involves a person outside the United States asking for help\ntransferring funds. The victim, who may be contacted as a result of posting a\nresume online, may receive money orders, checks, or funds transfers, and is\nasked to take a percentage and transfer the funds offshore. The funds received\nare typically fraudulent or stolen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a 2014 indictment in\nMississippi in which more than a dozen members of a Nigerian criminal organization\nwere charged with fraud, account takeovers, and money laundering.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The group\noperated via the Internet, primarily from South Africa but with alleged\nco-conspirators in the United States and Canada. The group allegedly bought\nstolen credit card numbers, bank and brokerage account data, and personal\nidentifying information online.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They used the information to open new accounts,\ntransferring value from the hacked accounts to banks accounts opened with\nstolen account information and altered or forged foreign passports. The group\nalso used the stolen funds to buy consumer electronics, or transferred the\nmoney to prepaid cards.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The group &nbsp;recruited additional victims and\nunknowing accomplices by sending mass e-mails to U.S. participants at online dating\nsites and other online community web sites.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some victims were sent counterfeit\nchecks and&nbsp; asked to deposit them into\ntheir bank accounts and transfer the proceeds to recipients in Africa. Others were\nasked to receive shipment of fraudulently acquired merchandise and reship the\ngoods to Africa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was approximately\n$1.52 trillion of U.S. banknotes in circulation&nbsp;\nand much of that currency circulates globally. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cash (bank notes) is an\neffective money laundering vehicle. It is anonymous, widely used, and everyday spending\nwith illicit cash is difficult to trace and impossible to confiscate once it is\nspent. Using large quantities of cash, however, can be conspicuous, cumbersome,\nand dangerous for criminals.
