Cash reporting and record keeping requirements\nmitigate this risk. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Preserving the\nintegrity of the U.S. financial system requires that banks effectively monitor\nand control the money laundering risks to which they are exposed. To this end,\nbanks are required to establish a written AML program reasonably designed to\nprevent their financial institutions from being used to facilitate money\nlaundering and the financing of terrorist activities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The introduction of illicit\nproceeds into the financial system is the first and critical step in the money\nlaundering process and banks are most vulnerable to being used for this purpose\nby criminals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once illicit proceeds are placed into the financial system, the\ncontinued use of banks to move those funds both domestically and\ninternationally can further obscure their criminal origins and facilitate their\nintegration into the system.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, establishing and maintaining an\neffective customer identification program (CIP) is a key control.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banks are put in a\nvulnerable position when individuals and entities attempt to disguise the\nnature, purpose, or ownership of their accounts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This can occur through:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Structuring and\nmisuse of currency deposits (interstate funnel accounts)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Misuse of\ncorrespondent banking services<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Misuse of new payment\ntechnologies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Nominees and misuse\nof legal entities<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Money Brokers and\nTrade-based money laundering<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Misuse of third party\npayment processors</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banks put themselves in\na vulnerable position when they fail to maintain effective compliance programs.Even\nin circumstances in which banks have effective compliance programs, a complicit\nemployee can make a bank vulnerable to illicit activity.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Structuring and Misuse\nof Currency Deposits (Interstate Funnel Accounts)-- &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Structuring is a common\ntechnique used to avoid a cash transaction threshold at which a financial\ninstitution applies recordkeeping and/or reporting obligations. Case examples\ndemonstrate that customers will structure deposits and withdrawals to keep cash\ntransactions below $10,000 to avoid the CTR reporting threshold</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Correspondent banking\nis the provision of banking services between two unrelated financial\ninstitutions, whether domestic or international. Correspondent banking\nrelationships are essential to the function of the U.S. and international\nfinancial system, facilitating everything from remittances, development, trade\nfinance, and economic development.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foreign correspondent\nbanking relationships allow financial institutions worldwide to facilitate\ncrossborder transactions in their currency of choice. They also enable\nfinancial institutions to conduct business and provide services to clients in\nforeign countries without the expense and burden of establishing a foreign\npresence. However, because of the complexity of correspondent account\nrelationships, multiple intermediary financial institutions may be involved in\na single funds transfer transaction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are more\nthan&nbsp; 300 banks in the United States that\nprovide correspondent banking services to foreign financial institutions. When\nthese U.S. banks receive funds or instructions for a funds transfer from a\nforeign correspondent bank, they likely do not have a relationship with the\noriginator of the payment.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;For this reason, conducting appropriate due\ndiligence on the foreign correspondent bank is critical to managing the\nvulnerability associated with this product. The complexity and volume of\ntransactions that flow through U.S. correspondent accounts, coupled with the\nvarying (often limited) recordkeeping requirements of funds transfer systems in\ndifferent countries increase the likelihood that some correspondent accounts\ncan be exploited to facilitate the flow of illicit proceeds into or through the\nU.S. financial system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As cross-border wire\ntransfers have come under increased scrutiny, DTOs have found paper\nchecks,money orders, traveler\u2019s checks, and cashier\u2019s checks to be an\nalternative.&nbsp; Money launderers can\ntransfer large dollar amounts outside the United States by writing checks or\nbuying money orders, traveler\u2019s checks, and cashier\u2019s checks and depositing\nthem in accounts at foreign financial institutions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sending those paper items\nback to the United States for clearing used to be a time-consuming process.\nNow, however, banks can scan the items and send a digital file via remote\ndeposit capture (RDC). RDC is used to make depositing checks faster and more\nconvenient. When properly managed, RDC can reduce processing costs, support new\nand existing products by financial institutions, and accelerate the\navailability of customers' funds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When used for illicit\npurposes, branded general purpose reloadable prepaid debit cards have been\nassociated with cashing out the proceeds of fraud and being used as an\nalternative to cash in much the same way that money orders, travelers\u2019 checks,\nand nonbank wires are used.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using a bank account\nheld in someone else\u2019s name, or in the name of a business, to hold, send, or\nreceive illicit proceeds, is a sophisticated method to circumvent a bank\u2019s\naccount opening procedures. As noted above, funnel accounts are typically held\nby a nominee. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWIFT, or the Society\nfor Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication, is a cooperative owned by\n3,000 financial institutions.&nbsp;&nbsp; SWIFT,\nthe global financial network that banks use to transfer billions of dollars\nevery day, warned its customers that it was aware of \"a number of recent\ncyber incidents\" where attackers had sent fraudulent messages over its\nsystem.&nbsp;</span><a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FwXjUIj2bPA/WMGNQbKsqpI/AAAAAAABRj8/fy1MWpwoU44pSU9krwzkjJfHIiDGYSkeQCLcB/s1600/SWIFT_ssmalware_25apr2016_v2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-align: center;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FwXjUIj2bPA/WMGNQbKsqpI/AAAAAAABRj8/fy1MWpwoU44pSU9krwzkjJfHIiDGYSkeQCLcB/s1600/SWIFT_ssmalware_25apr2016_v2.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jetB2b8HJmc/WMGNcl_xAiI/AAAAAAABRkA/5oRhSnTH-pE4DZxY0aKZqEk40dAE2iFUQCLcB/s1600/0fbb30ann948634f7cdddc132fdfd91cbc566ba6be_swift_01-01.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"504\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jetB2b8HJmc/WMGNcl_xAiI/AAAAAAABRkA/5oRhSnTH-pE4DZxY0aKZqEk40dAE2iFUQCLcB/s640/0fbb30ann948634f7cdddc132fdfd91cbc566ba6be_swift_01-01.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The disclosure came as law enforcement authorities in Bangladesh and\nelsewhere investigated the&nbsp; cyber theft\nof $81 million from the Bangladesh central bank account at the New York Federal\nReserve Bank. SWIFT has acknowledged that the scheme involved altering SWIFT\nsoftware on Bangladesh Bank's computers to hide evidence of fraudulent\ntransfers.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWIFT said the\nattackers obtained valid credentials for operators authorized to create and\napprove SWIFT messages, then submitted fraudulent messages by impersonating\nthose people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of Bank\nBangladesh, hackers transmitted a series of 'fraudulent' payment instructions\nvia SWIFT to the New York Federal Reserve (the Fed) ordering the transfer of\nlarge tranches of money from Bank Bangladesh's account there.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Fed,\nbelieving the messages had been authenticated in accordance with the SWIFT\nprotocols, transferred approximately $101 million to banks in Sri Lanka and the\nPhilippines.&nbsp; These funds&nbsp; were laundered through casinos. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hackers have accessed\nthe SWIFT system of three banks in India and inputted fake letters of credits\nand demand guarantees.&nbsp;&nbsp; The fraudsters\nintended to raise demands under those instruments to trigger the release of\nfunds&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banks should check the electronic\nSWIFT documents against the underlying documentation to cross-check their\nauthenticity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/lOsjczpp_II/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/lOsjczpp_II?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWIFT, or the Society\nfor Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication, is the world\u2019s largest\nelectronic payment messaging system, facilitating the exchange of more than $7\ntrillion a day..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though it gets lumped in with electronic funds transfer\nsystems, it doesn\u2019t do any of the funds transfers itself. In fact, it doesn\u2019t\neven touch money.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At its core, SWIFT is basically just a bank-to-bank messaging\nsystem. It supplies a standardized language that institutions use to\ncommunicate payment instructions and other info to each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWIFT messages are\nprogrammed in a language known as FIN. more than 11,000 institutions in more\nthan 200 nations are connected to SWIFT.. SWIFT uses a system of codes to\ndetail where a transfer is coming from, where it\u2019s going, and how it\u2019ll to get\nthere.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These strings of alphanumeric identifiers comprise an institution code,\na country code, a location code, and a branch code. Because SWIFT doesn\u2019t\nactually send money, institutions that use the network also need banking\nrelationship to move funds.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each financial institution will have a dedicated\nSWIFT interface (in other words, a computer-based terminal) on-premises. Most\nbanks set up their SWIFT systems so that they\u2019re isolated from the rest of\ntheir networks..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWIFT doesn\u2019t provide these services for free\u2014the cooperative\nmakes money from one-time setups, service and equipment fees, consulting, and\nit takes a cut each time a message is sent (its largest source of revenue),\namong other streams<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/diamond-remittance-case-politicians-bankers-ritesh-jain-rajeshwar-exports-demonetisation/1/900639.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/diamond-remittance-case-politicians-bankers-ritesh-jain-rajeshwar-exports-demonetisation/1/900639.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>TO BE\nHONEST WE HAVE TO&nbsp; UPGRADE ALL OUR POLICE\nSTATIONS .&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt;\">THE\nRUN OF THE MILL &nbsp;\u201c<span style=\"color: red;\">RAGADKE KHAINI MOONH\nMEIN DHAAL</span>\u201d , PANDU HAVALDAR POLICE STATION WONT WORK ANY MORE , &nbsp;IN THIS AGE OF DIGILIZATION .</b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WWyXrCfEfew/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/WWyXrCfEfew?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assi Chutki Nabbe Taal<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ragad Ke <b style=\"background-color: white;\">Kaini </b>Muh Me\nDaal</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To Fir Kaini Ka Dekh\nKamal<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to US DOJ,\ntelemarking fraud alone costs Americans about $40 billion each year and\ndisproportionately victimizes the elderly.&nbsp;\nThis is happening in India too .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telemarketing fraud is\nfraudulent selling conducted over the telephone. The term is also used for\ntelephone fraud not involving selling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telemarketing scammers\ncommunicate with potential victim by telephone. They pitch products or services\nin order to persuade consumers to make a purchase, getting the victim to hand\nover credit card details and other information. This allows criminals to commit\nidentity theft, assuming the identity of a consumer to make unauthorized\npurchases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telemarketing fraud is\none of the most persuasive deceptions, and it involves some sort of victim\ncompliance: the victim may initiate contact with the perpetrator, or they may\nvoluntarily provide private information to the offender. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus fraud victims may\nexperience feelings of shame and embarrassment that could prevent them from\nreporting their victimization. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Older people are\ndisproportionately targeted by fraudulent telemarketers and make up an\nestimated 80% of victims affected by telemarketing scams. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Older people may be\ntargeted because scammers assume they are more trusting, are too polite to hang\nup, or have a nest egg. &nbsp;Additionally,\nthey are often at home to receive the phone calls.. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Typically,\ntelemarketing fraud is targeted at the elderly, the poor, younger individuals\nand immigrants who do not have strong English skills in USA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At its core,\ntelemarketing fraud is a pretty simple crime: someone calls the victim, makes a\nfalse statement, and the misrepresentation causes the victim to give money to\nthe caller. This definition can cover a large variety of scams. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes, victims are\ntold that they won a prize in a foreign lottery and their personal information\nis required to receive the prize.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In another example, the scammer calls the\nvictim, claiming to be from an anti-virus software company, and convinces the\nvictim to allow the caller to access his or her computer in order to rid it of\na fictional virus. Once the scammer has the victim\u2019s personal information, he\ncan use it to access the victim\u2019s bank accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you send money to\npeople you do not know personally or give personal or financial information to\nunknown callers, you increase your chances of becoming a victim of\ntelemarketing fraud. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here are some warning\nsigns of telemarketing fraud\u2014what a caller may tell you:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYou must act \u2018now\u2019 or\nthe offer won\u2019t be good.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYou\u2019ve won a \u2018free\u2019\ngift, vacation, or prize.\u201d But you have to pay for \u201cpostage and handling\u201d or\nother charges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYou must send money,\ngive a credit card or bank account number, or have a check picked up by\ncourier.\u201d You may hear this before you have had a chance to consider the offer\ncarefully.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYou don\u2019t need to\ncheck out the company with anyone.\u201d The callers say you do not need to speak to\nanyone including your family, lawyer, accountant, local Better Business Bureau,\nor consumer protection agency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYou don\u2019t need any\nwritten information about the company or their references.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYou can\u2019t afford to\nmiss this \u2018high-profit, no-risk\u2019 offer.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you hear these or\nsimilar \u201clines\u201d from a telephone salesperson, just say \u201cno thank you\u201d and hang\nup the telephone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very difficult to\nget your money back if you have been cheated over the telephone. Before you buy\nanything by telephone, remember:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t buy from an\nunfamiliar company. Legitimate businesses understand that you want more\ninformation about their company and are happy to comply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Always ask for and wait\nuntil you receive written material about any offer or charity. If you get\nbrochures about costly investments, ask someone whose financial advice you\ntrust to review them.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;But beware\u2014not everything written down is true.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Always check out\nunfamiliar companies with your local consumer protection agency, Better\nBusiness Bureau, state attorney general, the National Fraud Information Center,\nor other watchdog groups. However, not all bad businesses can be identified\nthrough these organizations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obtain a salesperson\u2019s\nname, business identity, telephone number, street address, mailing address, and\nbusiness license number before you transact business.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some con artists give out\nfalse names, telephone numbers, addresses, and business license numbers\u2014verify\nthe accuracy of these items.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before you give money\nto a charity or make an investment, find out what percentage of the money is\npaid in commissions and what percentage actually goes to the charity or\ninvestment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before you send money,\nask yourself a simple question: \u201cWhat guarantee do I really have that this\nsolicitor will use my money in the manner we agreed upon?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t pay in advance\nfor services; pay only after they are delivered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be wary of companies\nthat want to send a messenger to your home to pick up money, claiming it is\npart of their service to you. In reality, they are taking your money without\nleaving any trace of who they are or where they can be reached.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Always take your time\nmaking a decision. Legitimate companies won\u2019t pressure you to make a snap\ndecision.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t pay for a \u201cfree\nprize.\u201d If a caller tells you the payment is for taxes, he or she is violating\nfederal law. &nbsp;Human greed is unlimited .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before you receive your\nnext sales pitch, decide what your limits are\u2014the kinds of financial\ninformation you will and won\u2019t give out on the telephone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be sure to talk over\nbig investments offered by telephone salespeople with a trusted friend, family\nmember, or financial advisor. It is never rude to wait and think about an\noffer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never respond to an\noffer you don\u2019t understand thoroughly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never send money or\ngive out personal information such as credit card numbers and expiration dates,\nbank account numbers, dates of birth, or social security numbers to unfamiliar\ncompanies or unknown persons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be aware that your\npersonal information is often brokered to telemarketers through third parties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have been\nvictimized once, be wary of persons who call offering to help you recover your\nlosses for a fee paid in advance.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have information\nabout a fraud, report it to &nbsp;law\nenforcement agencies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c765566129972252910\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_187M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html?showComment=1475055055396#c765566129972252910\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 28, 2016 at 3:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_187MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nA classic black money operator opens many shell companies to route money before it is invested.<br />\n<br />\nThis is called 'layering', and it helps in covering up the money trail. Assets are rarely in the beneficiary's name and money is moved through jurisdictions where Indian laws are not respected.<br />\n<br />\nOver the years, many such perfectly legal but complex financial systems have evolved that help convert black money into white.<br />\n<br />\nProfessional services firms located abroad, chartered accountants and savvy lawyers, all play a role in covering up the tracks, which perhaps no law - not even India's new antidote to black money, The Black Money (Undisclosed Foreign Income and Assets) Imposition of Tax Act, 2015 - can effectively counter or help unravel.<br />\n<br />\nDO A NARCO TEST ON SHELL COMPANY RUNNER SATYENDER JAIN ( AAP MINISTER ) FOR HAWALA TRANSACTIONS<br />\n<br />\nThe popular strategy for Zoom Developers, for example, was to channel the money through many shell companies across several countries. \"There are about 90 tax havens. One can move money from India to the Bahamas, to St. Kitts, to Cayman Islands (the world's fifth largest international financial centre) and, finally, to Switzerland (a country that reportedly manages one-third of the world's private wealth). You keep closing the shell companies once the money is transferred<br />\n<br />\nA Corporate presentation from 2009 was all praise for Vijay Choudhary. He is \"an entrepreneur-par-excellence\", a \"key driver in the growth of the organisation\", and the \"driving force behind the momentum of the enterprise\". His company, with interests ranging from industrial and engineering services to realty and infrastructure, however, started figuring in the list of top defaulters frequently since then.<br />\n<br />\nZoom Developers now owes over Rs 2,000 crore to 26 public sector banks. And in July this year, the Enforcement Directorate did something unprecedented by attaching the company's 1,280 acre landholding in California. Over the past several years, Zoom had borrowed heavily citing projects in European countries.<br />\n<br />\nThe money, allegedly, was siphoned off through many dummy firms - in India, Switzerland and London - and channelled to trusts. Part of the money was used to buy properties. Now, Zoom has taken down its website; e-mail accounts have been disabled; and telephone lines are dead. According to an Enforcement Directorate source, Choudhary is absconding.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HAPPENS AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN IN INDIA<br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY, COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY ONLY WANTS TO SCREW SUBRATA ROY WHO IS INDIAs BIGGEST EMPLOYER AFTER INDIAN RAILWAYS<br />\n<br />\nHow does trade mispricing work? Sample this: An Indian company, either promoter-owned or registered under a shell company typically located in Kolkata, can start by importing everything from heavy machinery to software - say, an ice cream machine, which costs $100,000. The company quotes an inflated price of $1 million.<br />\n<br />\nThe manufacturer of the machine or its suppliers may not want to produce a fake voucher with the inflated price. Therefore, another shell company will be set up offshore, for instance in Dubai. It will first import the ice cream machine at the original price, and then sell it to the Indian company for $1 million.<br />\n<br />\nNo one will have an inkling about the fact that the Dubai company is also related to the promoters. The Indian company next remits $1 million to the Dubai shell. This is done through a banking channel<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE BIGGER DEFAUTERS THAN VIJAYA MALLYA WHO HAVE BORROWED MONEY FROM INDIANS BANKS AND SIPHONED OFF THE WHOLE MONEY ABROAD TO INVEST IN PROPERTIES<br />\n<br />\nOne can import software - get a shell company in Singapore or Hong Kong to send a blank CD. You declare that you have received a proprietary software and it costs $200,000. Even on a small scale, you can remit the money abroad. The claim is backed up by the invoice and a genuine courier<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_187BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_187b+seedKA2uD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_186T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_187b+seedKA2uD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_186TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_186TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_186TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_187b+seedKA2uD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_186TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_186TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_187b+seedKA2uD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_186TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_186TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_186TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_187b+seedKA2uD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_186B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1350384741973001405\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_186M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html?showComment=1475055074902#c1350384741973001405\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 28, 2016 at 3:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_186MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nDubai is not a diamond polishing hub. Why is it importing or exporting as much?<br />\n<br />\nWhy do you think the surat diamond merchants want to avoid the plane route to Mumbai ?<br />\n<br />\nAPCO Modi will build a fast train for them . .<br />\n<br />\nThe return journey of black money typically has a sequence. Money is parked in a trust-friendly jurisdiction, such as Switzerland, before it is moved to a tax-efficient country such as Cyprus, where the taxation levels are very low, or have no taxes. It is then routed to a tax-friendly country like Mauritius, before reaching the final destination in India. India has a Double Taxation Avoidance Treaty (DTAA) with Mauritius.<br />\n<br />\nARE WE TO SAY THAT LAWYER TURNED FINANCE MINISTER ARUN JAITLEY WHO LOVED FDI --DOES NOT UNDERSTAND ALL THIS<br />\n<br />\nThere are advantages when you bring in FDI through Mauritius. When you sell shares, you can avoid capital gains tax. And, any money that comes in as FDI is presumably clean money.<br />\n<br />\nHow does one convert black into white in India? There are several options. Some are less tax efficient and may involve forgery. One can open a company to sell bags or a restaurant. The business may not take off, but the owner can still show cash sales of Rs 2 lakh a day. Slowly, but surely, all money would be legitimate one day!<br />\n<br />\nMany of these so-called software companies were known to be using the Hawala route in order to show income from software exports. Getting the knowledge about these transactions was not a big deal. It is provided to these companies by the CA's,Lawyers and other professionals who knows the transactional loopholes.<br />\n<br />\nA Hawala transaction simply means that you pay rupees over here in India and in return get dollars abroad. For instance, if you want to do a Hawala transaction from Mumbai to USA, then by paying Rs 5 lac in Mumbai, you can transfer THE DOLLAR EQUIVALENT ( minus service charges ) in USA.<br />\n<br />\nCBI said that advocate Gautam Khaitan, an accused in the Rs3,700 crore VVIP chopper scam has accepted of setting up shell companies \u2013which received huge amounts of kickbacks from aerospace and defence group, AgustaWestland.<br />\n<br />\nSHELL COMPANY KA MATLAB KYAA ?<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_187b+seedKA2uD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_187b+seedKA2uD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2065725698115293629\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_185M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html?showComment=1475049575423#c2065725698115293629\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 28, 2016 at 1:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nShadow banking refers to all the non-bank financial intermediaries that provide services similar to those of traditional commercial banks.<br />\n<br />\nThey generally carry out traditional banking functions, but do so outside the traditional system of regulated depository institutions.<br />\n<br />\nShadow banking has grown in importance in the last TWO decades and this affects India\u2019s GDP and growth<br />\n<br />\nIn the last 60 years, India has lost 1700 billion US dollars \u2018tax avoidance\u2019, with hawala transactions accounting for 45 per cent of it<br />\n<br />\nTHERE HAS BEEN NO POLITICAL WILLTO STOP THIS. BECAUSE ELECTIONS ARE NOW WON WITH HAWALA MONEY FROM ABROAD.<br />\n<br />\nAlthough these transactions are punishable under the Foreign Exchange Management Act, 2000 and Prevention of Money Laundering Act 2002, hawala transactions often go unnoticed as politicians and big hawala operators have been known to share a cosy and symbiotic relationship.<br />\n<br />\nCONGRESS / MUSLIM LEAGUE OF KERALA / COMMUNIST PARTY ALLOWED HAWALA TO THRIVE IN KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nSOME OF THESE FUNDS COME FROM PAKISTAN AND WAHHABI SAUDI ARABIA . .<br />\n<br />\nHawala money moves in ambulances during election time.<br />\n<br />\nDo narco tests on major gold jewelry shop owners and all the beans will spill like a domino .<br />\n<br />\nOn September 24, 2015, West Bengal woke up to a fake lottery scam involving hawala ties with Dubai. The Central Board of Direct Taxes seized Rs 200 million and close to 20 sacks of notes were recovered from two locations in Kolkata and one in Siliguri.<br />\n<br />\nIn Kerala HAWALA transfers thrives \u2013and politicians , police and judiciary are in cahoots.<br />\n<br />\nThe Dubai market is directly under the control of the ISI ( and Dawood ), which has used this route in the past to move terror and drug money.<br />\n<br />\nA hawala operator offers lower cost of transfer, a better exchange rate and freedom from tax burdens in India - not an illegal activity in the emirates<br />\n<br />\nHawala is an informal value transfer system based on the performance and honour of a huge network of money brokers, primarily located in the Middle East, operating outside of, or parallel to, traditional banking, financial channels, and remittance systems<br />\n<br />\nIn the most basic variant of the hawala system, money is transferred via a network of hawala brokers, or hawaladars. It is the transfer of money without actually moving it. In fact, a successful definition of the hawala system that is used is \"money transfer without money movement\".<br />\n<br />\nHawala example transaction modus operandi-----<br />\n<br />\n(1) A customer (A) approaches a hawala broker (X) in one city and gives a sum of money that is to be transferred to a recipient (B) in another, usually foreign, city.<br />\n<br />\nAlong with the money, he usually specifies something like a password that will lead to the money being paid out . The hawala broker X calls another hawala broker M in the recipient's city, and informs M about the agreed password, or gives other disposition instructions of the funds.<br />\n<br />\nThen, the intended recipient (B), who also has been informed by A about the password now approaches M and tells him the agreed password..<br />\n<br />\nIf the password is correct, then M releases the transferred sum to B, usually minus a small commission. X now basically owes M the money that M had paid out to B; thus M has to trust X's promise to settle the debt at a later date.<br />\n<br />\nThe unique feature of the system is that no promissory instruments are exchanged between the hawala brokers; the transaction takes place entirely on the honour system.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_185BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_185b+seedKA2sD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_184T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_185b+seedKA2sD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_184TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_184TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_184TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_185b+seedKA2sD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_184TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_184TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_185b+seedKA2sD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_184TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_184TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_184TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_185b+seedKA2sD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_184B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1887490201435270004\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_184M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html?showComment=1475049604726#c1887490201435270004\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 28, 2016 at 1:30 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_184MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nAs the system does not depend on the legal enforceability of claims, it can operate even in the absence of a legal and juridical environment.<br />\n<br />\nTrust and extensive use of connections, such as family relations and regional affiliations, are the components that distinguish it from other remittance systems.<br />\n<br />\nInformal records are produced of individual transactions, and a running tally of the amount owed by one broker to another is kept.<br />\n<br />\nSettlements of debts between hawala brokers can take a variety of forms (such as goods, services, properties, transfers of employees, etc.), and need not take the form of direct cash transactions.<br />\n<br />\nIn addition to commissions, hawala brokers often earn their profits through bypassing official exchange rates. Generally, the funds enter the system in the source country's currency and leave the system in the recipient country's currency.<br />\n<br />\nAs settlements often take place without any foreign exchange transactions, they can be made at other than official exchange rates.<br />\n<br />\nHawala is attractive to customers because it provides a fast and convenient transfer of funds, usually with a far lower commission than that charged by banks.<br />\n<br />\nKILL THE HAWALA SYSTEM TO BECOME A ECONOMIC SUPERPOWER .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_185b+seedKA2sD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_185b+seedKA2sD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4170311639105925977\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_183M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html?showComment=1474974751888#c4170311639105925977\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 27, 2016 at 4:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_183MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCHINA IS NOT AN ECONOMIC TIGER<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHADOW BANKING IN CHINA HAS BEEN HIDDEN FOR TOO LONG .<br />\n<br />\nThe term \u201cshadow bank\u201d is a recent one.<br />\n<br />\nIt is a big bond fund to describe risky off-balance-sheet vehicles hatched by banks to sell loans repackaged as bonds.<br />\n<br />\nToday, the term is used more loosely to cover all financial intermediaries that perform bank-like activity but are not regulated as one.<br />\n<br />\nThese include mobile payment systems, pawnshops, peer-to-peer lending websites, hedge funds and bond-trading platforms set up by technology firms. Among the biggest are asset management companies<br />\n<br />\nThe biggest risk in the shadow banking industry lies in its \u201clack of visibility\u201d and that could bring shocks to the economy further down the line.<br />\n<br />\nChinese companies looking for cash lean on bond markets that offer extraordinarily low interest rates.<br />\n<br />\nShadow banks have flourished in part because the traditional ones, battered by losses incurred during the financial slump, are under pressure. Tighter capital requirements and fear of heavy penalties have kept them grounded. In China, where banks are discouraged from lending to certain industries and are mandated to offer frustratingly low interest rates on deposits, non-banks fill the gap.<br />\n<br />\nAbout 81% of all lending in China are by shadow banks are \u201cbank loans in disguise\u201d-- devised by reckless nay MAD MEN .<br />\n<br />\nUnlike banks, which lend against deposits from customers, non-banks loan money using investor\u2019s cash and rotating lines of credit.<br />\n<br />\nShadow banking sector is enmeshed in the creation of the stock market bubble within bubble.<br />\n<br />\nShadow banking was aimed at maximizing the potential profits on borrowed money as even though copper importers in China received letters of credit valid for 3-6 months, the purchased copper was immediately sold on the domestic market, meaning the importer basically had a \u2018free\u2019 line of credit as it could invest the proceeds from the copper sales before having to repay the money drawn down from the letter of credit.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BEGGAR NATO NATIONS WITH HUGE DEBTS ARE NOW APING CHINA. INDIA IS A HEALTHY TRANSPARENT ECONOMY . .<br />\n<br />\nThe total assets of the shadow banking systems in both the Eurozone and the USA are increasing. The total assets of the shadow banking \u2018system\u2019 increased by 35 trillion Dollars.<br />\n<br />\nFor example--in UK, the relative size of the shadow banking industry is more than 34% of the total financial assets in the country.<br />\n<br />\nI DARE THE CHOOTS ( STUDENTS AND PROFESSORS ) IN INDIAN BUSINESS SCHOOLS TO WRITE A THESIS ON SHADOW BANKING. THEY CAN TAKE HELP FROM \"LAWYER\" PRETENDER ARUN JAITLEY .<br />\n<br />\nBLOODY CUNTS !<br />\n<br />\nWE WONT ALLOW ISLAMIC SHADOW BANKING IN INDIA-- JEW MONEY !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Reserve Bank of\nIndia has sharply brought down the threshold above which non-banking finance\ncompanies (NBFCs) can disburse loans against gold only by cheque.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The central bank said\nwith immediate effect such loans amounting to Rs. 20,000 and above can be\ndisbursed only by cheque as against the earlier threshold of Rs. 1 lakh and\nabove. This move is in line with the rules issued under the Income Tax Act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This move should be\nseen in the backdrop of the government scrapping Rs. 500 and Rs. 1000 bank\nnotes during the demonetisation period (November 9, 2016 to December 30, 2016)\nand its emphasis on digital payments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The note scrapping\nexercise resulted in almost 86 per cent of the currency in circulation being\nsucked out of the economy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A shadow banking\ninstitution is defined as\" a credit intermediary involving entities and activities\noutside the regular banking system\".&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Indian context,\nthe system is mainly spearheaded by the NBFCs along with quasi-formal and\ninformal systems like &nbsp;Chit Funds, Gold loan\nSaving and Blade Loan Companies, Pawn Brokers, etc. Some of the startling facts\nabout these institutions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-banking financial\ncompanies, or NBFCs, are financial institutions that provide certain types of\nbanking services, but do not hold a banking license. Generally, these\ninstitutions are not allowed to take deposits from the public, which keeps them\noutside the scope of traditional oversight required under banking regulations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NBFCs can offer banking services such as loans and credit facilities,\nretirement planning, money markets, underwriting, and merger activities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today NBFCs account for\nmore than &nbsp;42% of India's financial\nsystem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than &nbsp;72% of outlets in Gold Loan Companies like\nMuthoot Fin Corp are in rural and semi-urban areas signifying the deep reach\nwhich these institutions have been able to achieve.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shriram Capital\nLimited, one of the largest chit funds in the country, has a considerable\npresence in all the four southern states and manages over &nbsp;820 million USD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The emergence of the\nSelf Help Groups and Micro-finance Institutions has added another dimension to\nthe shadow banking story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A problem which the\nIndian Banks face is that of dormant accounts which hamper the banking system's\nresource utilization. Such situations automatically give rise to a need for an\nalternate banking system which is simpler and less document ridden. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An important difference\nfound between the shadow banking practices of the developed world as against\nthe developing countries is that of their emergence with the NBFCs acting as a\ntool in the west to absorb the risks after a need to de-risk the complex\nbanking industry while shadow entities in the developing world serve as an\nintermediary between the country's banking system and the consumer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The biggest challenge\nfor the regulators is to measure the magnitude of shadow banking as this area\nis continually evolving by taking advantage of the gaps in the mandates of\nregulatory agencies that try to control them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is also an\nabsence of a complete database regarding these entities, and the opaqueness of\nsize, structure, operation and interlinking with commercial banks and the\nfinancial sector may distort the information content of the monetary policy\nindicators and thereby undermine the conduct of the monetary policy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RBI has taken several\ninitiatives to increase the efficiency of NBFC regulation, take care of the\nrisks posed by them to the financial stability of the country, address\ninterests of depositors as well as the customers and help the sector grow in an\nefficient manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a need to\ndevelop a more organized structure and bring the plethora of entities under the\numbrella of shadow banking in the country under a uniform law and address the\nissue of money laundering and tax evasion.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN KERALA THERE ARE BLADE\nCOMPANIES WHO WILL GIVE LOANS AT HIGH INTEREST RATES ( IN CASH ONLY ) PROVIDED\nGOLD JEWELRY IS GIVEN AS COLLATERAL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY THEN PLEDGE THE SAME\nGOLD IN OTHER BLADE COMPANIES &nbsp;FOR HIGHER\nRETURNS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.thehindu.com/news/national/andhra-pradesh/police-crack-gold-loan-scam-bank-staffer-among-17-held/article7406427.ece</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOME OF THESE BLADE\nCOMPANIES ORGANISE THEFT OF THEIR OWN GOLD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MUTHOOT FINCORP NOW HAS\n3800 BRANCHES DOING SHADOW BANKING.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://www.business-standard.com/article/finance/cash-for-gold-loans-hide-shadow-banking-risks-in-india-112122302009_1.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India builders and\ncontractors having BLACK MONEY love micro finance.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
