, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A builder has surplus\ncash on hand received through illegitimate sources which he decides to invest\nin order to camouflage the origin of this unlawful money. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He gives the cash to a\nMicrofinance Institution which further distributes it in the form of small\ncredit to several borrowers. These borrowers return the loan and also seek\nfurther credit, thus eliminating the trail of the unlawful money of the\nbuilder.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The MFI is usually in\ncahoots with the builder, &nbsp;small credit will\nbe offered to &nbsp;ghost borrowers. Thus,\nrotating the funds in a legitimate but dishonest way. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are more than 192\nmillion ( 1920 lakhs ) accounts held under the umbrella of MFI\u2019s. These\naccounts represent almost 19% of the total national population. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This system has\npatronage from rich and corrupt politicians . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The current structure\nof the distribution of microfinances is largely unregulated and hence most MFIs\nare relatively unaccountable for their actions regarding allocation of\nfinances. The absence of stringent regulations leaves a lacuna which renders\nthe institutions susceptible to activities beyond the purview of law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These MFIs appear to\nshadow deep rooted political agendas. In India most of the TERRORISTS are\nfunded by MFIs. Foreign funded Trojan Horse NGOs operate their own MFIs.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARE WE CUNTS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO WE ALLOW THIS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/cuttack/odisha-police-finds-evidence-about-black-money-transaction-in-jan-dhan-accounts/articleshow/56299560.cms</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muhammad Yunus and his\norganization have been named in the ongoing Pizza Gate investigation, where\ncareer DC politicians have been implicated in procuring children out of a\nbusiness complex registered to Andrew Kline (appointed to DOJ by Bill Clinton)\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muhammad Yunus had a\nnon-profit bank, Grameen Bank. Yunus had been working for Clinton Foundation's\nCGI programs as early as 2005. &nbsp;&nbsp;He also\nchaired Grameen America, the bank's non-profit for the US flagship, which\ndonated $100K to $250K for the Clinton Foundation. Another Grameen chaired position\nby Yunus was Grameen Research, which donated $25K- $50K.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yunus first met with\nClinton in 2009 and six months later USAID partnered with Grameen Foundation\nrun by Yunus, thereby, giving Grameen a $162 million commitment to extend\nmicro-financing concept abroad. USAID began to provide loans and grants to\nGrameen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The millions in funds\nwere given to Yunus\u2019 Bangladesh-based Grameen Bank through 18 different U.S.\nAgency for International Development (USAID) grants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOBEL PRIZE WINNER\nMOHAMMAD YUNUS OF BANGLADESH IS A CRYTO JEW WHO HAS CONNECTIONS WITH VARIOUS\nZIONIST JEW FOUNDATIONS. &nbsp;THERE ARE\nSEVERAL PICTURES OF HIM WITH THE CLINTONS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DID MOHAMMAD YUNUS\nDONATE 3 LAKH US DOLLARS TO THE CLINTONS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Clintons personally\nlobbied to press the Nobel Committee to award Yunus with the peace prize<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clinton\u2019s aid to Yunus\nalso included 18 grants, contracts and loans awarded to two of his\nAmerica-based foundations, the Grameen Foundation USA and Grameen America. The\nDepartment of Treasury awarded a $600,000 grant directly to Grameen America\nunder a fund designed to boost financial institutions in community development.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When asked to explain\nthe Yunus grants and loans, USAID Spokesman Raphael Cook said the agency didn\u2019t\nhave the \u201cmanpower\u201d to respond to questions about the transactions. A series of\nSmall Business Administration grants to Grameen America also began in July\n2011, totaling $934,000.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those grants were for \u201csalaries and expenses\u201d for the\nfoundation to operate its New York offices where Clinton once a U.S. senator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yunus was popular among\nelements of the Bangladesh military. When a group of generals overthrew the\nBangladesh government in January 2007, Yunus considered establishing a new\npolitical party to lead the new military-led government, thereby legitimizing\nthe coup.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The BBC reported April\n7, 2007, that \u201cthe army would sponsor Nobel Peace prize winner Dr. Muhammad\nYunus as a new leader.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sabir Mustafa, the\nBBC\u2019s Bengali Service editor, added that \u201cDr. Yunus is still viewed as a\ncredible candidate by elements in the army.\u201d In the end, Yunus opted not to\ncreate the new party.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DO YOU REMEMBER KACHRAWAAL\nSAYING THAT ONLY NOBEL PRIZE WINNERS AND MAGSAYSAY AWARD WINNER CAN BE JURISTS\nIN JAN LOKPAL \u2013 AND THAT FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs MUST BE EXEMPTED FROM JAN LOKPAL\nPURVIEW ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN WILL ROTHSCHILD\nASK NOBEL PRIZE WINNERS KAILASH SATYARTHI AND JEWESS MALALA YOUSAFZAI TO FLOAT\nTHEIR OWN POLITICAL PARTIES ?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ISIS , WHITE HELMETS AND\nJEW RABBIs DOING ORGAN TRAFFICKING AS A TEAM, BUILDING UP A HUMAN ORGAN BANK..&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SALES\nHAPPEN VIA SHELL COMPANIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though NBFCs are\noffering online services, not many rich customers have been using them. They prefer\nanonymous cash dealings .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even if NBFC customers\ndo take the digital route in future, they are more likely to do so via mobile\nphones and not the online channel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Non-Banking Financial\nCompany (NBFC) is a company registered under the Companies Act, 1956 engaged in\nthe business of loans and advances, acquisition of &nbsp;shares stocks bonds debentures\u2019 securities\nissued by Government or local authority or other marketable securities of a\nlike nature, leasing, hire-purchase, insurance business, chit business but does\nnot include any institution whose principal business is that of agriculture\nactivity, industrial activity, purchase or sale of any goods (other than\nsecurities) or providing any services and sale \u2019purchase\u2019 construction of\nimmovable property. A non-banking institution which is a company and has\nprincipal business of receiving deposits under any scheme or arrangement in one\nlump sum or in installments by way of contributions or in any other manner, is\nalso a non-banking financial company (Residuary non-banking company). \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NBFCs lend and make\ninvestments and hence their activities are akin to that of banks; however there\nare a few differences as given below:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">i. NBFC cannot accept\ndemand deposits;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ii. NBFCs do not form\npart of the payment and settlement system and cannot issue cheques drawn on\nitself;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">iii. deposit insurance\nfacility of Deposit Insurance and Credit Guarantee Corporation is not available\nto depositors of NBFCs, unlike in case of banks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NBFCs whose asset size\nis of Rs 500 cr or more as per last audited balance sheet are considered as\nsystemically important NBFCs. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\nrationale for such classification is that the activities of such NBFCs will\nhave a bearing on the financial stability of the overall economy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reserve Bank of India MUST\ncreate the post of an NBFC specific OMBUDSMAN. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ombudsman or public\nadvocate is usually appointed by the government or by parliament, but with a\nsignificant degree of independence, who is charged with representing the\ninterests of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of\nmaladministration or a violation of rights\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ombudsman could\nallow customers to lodge complaints against NBFCs for levying charges without\nprior notice, non-observance of RBI directives on interest rates,\nnon-acceptance of applications for loans without valid reasons or\nnon-compliance of guidelines on engaging recovery agents. For banks, the ombudsman\nwas appointed two decades ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microfinance\ninstitutions are facing low loan recovery rate after the scrapping of old Rs\n500 and Rs 1,000 notes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recovery of credit in\nthe MFI industry is primarily in the form of cash, this must stop \u2013we must\nintroduce a &nbsp;digital system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All NBFC MFIs are\nrequired to maintain a cumulative capital adequacy of 20 % of their aggregate\nrisk weighted assets. &nbsp;&nbsp;The general\npublic falls prey to fictitious offers promising unsustainable returns by\nunincorporated bodies and companies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NBFC must be &nbsp;registered with RBI and is specifically\nauthorised to accept deposits. NBFCs have to prominently display the\nCertificate of Registration (CoR) issued by the Reserve Bank on its site. If an\nNBFC is authorised to accept public deposit, the certificate reflects that. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RBI does not guarantee\nthe repayment of deposits accepted by NBFCs \u2013 hence the need to be digital and\ntransparent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Currently, the maximum\ninterest rate that an NBFC can pay to a depositor should not exceed 12.5%. The\nReserve Bank, however, keeps changing these interest rates depending on the\nmacro-economic environment.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;I remember in Kerala Blade Companies were offering\n36 % interest in newspaper 4 decades ago. All greedy depositors 99% lost their\nmoney.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The depositor must have\na proper receipt ( book with serial number printed by RBI ) for every amount of\ndeposit placed with the company. The receipt should be duly signed by an person/\nofficer authorised by the company and should state the date of the deposit, the\nname of the depositor, the amount in words and figures, rate of interest\npayable, maturity date and amount.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Criminals are looking for and finding virtual\ncurrencies that offer: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Anonymity for both\nusers and transactions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The ability to move\nillicit proceeds from one country to another quickly<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Low volatility, which\nresults in lower exchange risk<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Widespread adoption\nin the criminal underground<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Trustworthiness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following virtual\ncurrency prosecutions involve service providers that intentionally promoted anonymity\nand other virtual currency attributes attractive to criminals:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In 2013, in Oregon, two Portland residents and\ntwo Vancouver residents were charged with drug trafficking and money laundering\nin connection with selling methamphetamine internationally in exchange for\nBitcoin through the now defunct online illicit bazaar Silk Road.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Silk Road was only accessible through an\nencrypted underground network, TOR (formerly, The Onion Router), and the\nmajority of electronic communications between buyers and sellers was on the Silk\nRoad website via internal private messaging.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All transactions were paid for in Bitcoin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The methamphetamine was\nallegedly sent to buyers through the United States Postal Service and package\ndelivery services.&nbsp; The Bitcoins received\nby the alleged drug traffickers were later exchanged online for U.S. currency\nreceived as money orders and via PayPal and Western Union wires.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The funds were\nultimately placed in U.S. bank and prepaid card accounts opened with false identification,\nand the money then distributed to members of the organization.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In USA Five people were\nbusted for bilking Medicare and Medicaid in a years long, $86\u2009million scam in\nwhich they paid kickbacks in order to bill for bogus procedure..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Billions of dollars in\nfraudulently obtained Medicare reimbursement checks are cashed through check\ncashers that are either knowingly filing CTRs ( consent to release ) that\ninclude false identifying information, or are avoiding filing CTRs\naltogether.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of those identified\nas laundering proceeds of healthcare fraud through check cashing companies have\nbeen linked to organized crime groups</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.reuters.com/article/us-shellcompanies-medicare-idUSTRE7BK0PY20111221\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-shellcompanies-medicare-idUSTRE7BK0PY20111221</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one of the cases,\nBelair Payroll Services, a licensed check casher in Queens, New York, cashed\nchecks associated with healthcare fraud.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two Belair customers\nnamed in the indictment had allegedly recruited foreign students in the United\nStates on temporary J-1 visas to create shell companies and open bank accounts,\nwhich subsequently were used to deposit payments received from a fraudulent\nhealthcare billing scheme.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The defendants wrote checks on the shell company\naccounts to cash out the healthcare fraud proceeds and cashed them at Belair\nPayroll Services, which allegedly agreed not to file CTRs or to file false CTRs\non the cash payments that exceeded $10,000.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nindictments involving check cashers, the allegations in the Belair Payroll\nProcessing case are typical. &nbsp; Perpetrators of fraud, particularly healthcare\nfraud, in which the payment is made by check in response to a false claim, seek\nout check cashers who agree to cash checks for tens of thousands of dollars without\nfiling a CTR or to make a false report.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://cbs4indy.com/2016/10/12/former-officials-with-american-senior-communities-arrested-in-fraud-case/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://cbs4indy.com/2016/10/12/former-officials-with-american-senior-communities-arrested-in-fraud-case/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering is not\nthe same as hiding money. One hides money to avoid paying taxes on it. One\nlaunders money to make it look like legitimate earnings when in fact it is\ndirty money. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Declaring and paying\ntaxes on money are essential parts of laundering it. The money laundering\nregulations do not apply to travelers' checks - that is not the problem. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Third party cheques and\ntraveller\u2019s cheques are often purchased using proceeds of crime. Since these\nare negotiable in many countries, the nexus with the source money is difficult\nto establish. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is now far better to\ntravel with an ATM card than travellers cheques. &nbsp;Banks will still accept them, but due to anti\nmoney laundering and counterfeitting they are not used as widely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A traveler's cheque is\na medium of exchange that can be used in place of hard currency. They can be\ndenominated in one of a number of major world currencies and are preprinted,\nfixed-amount cheques designed to allow the person signing it to make an\nunconditional payment to someone else as a result of having paid the issuer for\nthat privilege.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were generally\nused by people on vacation in foreign countries instead of cash, as many\nbusinesses used to accept traveler's cheques as currency.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The incentive for\nmerchants and other parties to accept them lay in the fact that as long as the\noriginal signature (which the buyer is supposed to place on the cheque in ink\nas soon as they receive the cheque) and the signature made at the time the\ncheque is used is the same, the cheque's issuer will unconditionally guarantee\npayment of the face amount even if the cheque was fraudulently issued, stolen,\nor lost.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means that a traveler's cheque can never 'bounce' unless the\nissuer goes bankrupt and out of business. If a traveler's cheque were lost or\nstolen, it could be replaced by the issuing financial institution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their use has been in\ndecline since the 1990s. Around this time, a variety of more convenient\nalternatives, such as credit cards, debit cards, and automated teller machines,\nbecame more widely available and were easier for travelers to use. Traveler's\ncheques are no longer widely accepted and cannot easily be cashed, even at the\nbanks that issue them<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are times when\nyou're traveling somewhere dangerous, and are legitimately concerned about\ngetting mugged or hotel room security is lax . Traveler's checks can only be\ncashed by you, and will require your presence and signature, thus saving you\nthe hassle of having to cancel all of your cards should they get stolen, or\nhaving your bank accounts emptied.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, you should never rely solely on\ntraveler's checks either, as not all businesses accept them these days. They\nshould be used in addition to cash or credit cards<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Travellers cheques are\nvery easy to counterfeit and so an entire area may refuse to accept them.\nTraveler's checks were a product catered to an ATM-less market.&nbsp;&nbsp; Today, it generally only makes sense to use\nthem when you're in a place where ATMs are few and far between<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1485162958396442329\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_55M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. THIS IS NOT A VESTED \u201cNOBEL PRIZE \u201c<br />\n<br />\n1) NIKOLA TESLA<br />\n2) DIMITRI MENDELEYEEV<br />\n3) IE IRODOV<br />\n4) ARYABHATTA<br />\n5) SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN<br />\n6) CHANAKYA<br />\n7) ADI SHANKARACHARYA<br />\n8) APOLLONIUS ( AN INDIAN SAGE \u2013WHO LEGACY WAS SHIFTED ON TO A COOKED UP JESUS IN 325 AD )<br />\n<br />\nCCC) DOWN THE SHIT HOLE----<br />\n<br />\n1) SUHEL SETH<br />\n2) PRITISH NANDI<br />\n3) <b><span style=\"color: red;\">DILIP CHERIAN&nbsp;</span></b><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7326249998837708762\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_55M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5964500518806054387\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_28M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. I know his type of economics.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br />WELL INDIA'S \"IMAGE GURU \"-- DILIP BABY--<br /><br />YOUR HALCYON DAYS ARE OVER</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />https://www.pgurus.com/pr-agent-dilip-cherian-in-cbi-radar-for-bagging-rs-158cr-from-kejriwal-govt-without-tender/</span><br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT THE WHO IS WHO WHO ATTENDS DILIP CHERIANs PARTIES<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://photogallery.indiatimes.com/events/delhi/dilip-and-devi-cherians-pre-christmas-party/articleshow/27462196.cms</span><br />\n<br />\nHE IS UNDER WATCH -- ALL IN GOOD TIME<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 16, BELOW</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_11.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_11.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aRT6_KOHHN8/WMFjBic0w1I/AAAAAAABRjs/_FxrxEylvpMIP96MXHzp6Ro71bIPEowYgCLcB/s1600/2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aRT6_KOHHN8/WMFjBic0w1I/AAAAAAABRjs/_FxrxEylvpMIP96MXHzp6Ro71bIPEowYgCLcB/s400/2.jpg\" width=\"180\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "122", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8022843086764015434/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "6329977585026572485", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-03-08T10:14:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-03-09T19:46:21+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDg5MDY4OTgxMTA4Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_8.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6329977585026572485", "title": "SHELL COMPANIES for money laundering, tax evasion, hiding kickbacks, layering PART 14 -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 13, BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_7.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_7.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_50M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration: none;\">March 8, 2017 at 10:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The National Money\nLaundering Risk Assessment (NMLRA) identifies the money laundering risks that\nare of priority concern to the United States.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of the NMLRA is to\nhelp the public and private sectors recognize and understand the money\nlaundering methods used in the United States, the effectiveness of current\nefforts to address the threats and vulnerabilities that create money laundering\nopportunities, and the residual risk to the financial system and national\nsecurity</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Armtwisted by Jew Rothschild and his agent, US\nauthorities defended their decision not to prosecute HSBC for accepting the\ntainted money of rogue states and drug lords , insisting that a\n$1.9 BILLION USD fine for a litany of offences was preferable to the \"collateral\nconsequences\" of taking the bank to court.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HSBC had DELIBERATELY failed to\nimplement anti-money laundering controls. Had the US authorities decided to\npress criminal charges, HSBC would almost certainly have lost its banking\nlicence in the US..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mexican drug traffickers deposited hundreds of thousands of\ndollars each day in HSBC accounts. The bank processed cash for Mexico's Sinaloa\ncartel, regarded as the most powerful and deadly drug gang in the world, among\nothers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At least $881m in drug trafficking money was laundered throughout HSBC\naccounts. In order to handle the \"staggering amounts of cash\", the\nbank even widened the windows at some branches to allow tellers to accept\nlarger boxes of money.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HSBC had sacked all the senior staff involved in\nthe scandal, and agreed to stringent monitoring \u2013 the first time a foreign bank\nhas agreed to such oversight<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SACKING RICH JEWISH BANKERS IS NO DETERRENT \u2014 ONLY\nLONG JAIL TERMS WORK</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Formerly known as Hong\nKong Shanghai Bank Corporation, ( started by Opium drug runners Jew Rothschild\nand Sassoon ) HSBC has served as the world\u2019s &nbsp;No1 drug money laundry since its inception as\na repository for British Crown opium proceeds accrued during the Chinese Opium\nWars. During the Vietnam War HSBC laundered CIA heroin proceeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The American Kosher families\nPerkins, Astor and Forbes made millions off the opium trade.&nbsp; The Perkins\u2019 founded Bank of Boston, which is\ntoday known as Credit Suisse First Boston<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both 2003 and 2010,\nU.S. regulators ordered HSBC to strengthen its anti-money laundering practices..\nIn October 2010, the United States OCC issued a Cease and Desist Order\nrequiring HSBC to strengthen multiple aspects of its Anti-Money Laundering\n(AML) program..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The identified problems included a once massive backlog of over\n17,000 alerts identifying suspicious activity, failure to file timely\nsuspicious activity reports with U.S. law enforcement, failure to conduct any\ndue diligence to assess risks to HSBC affiliates before opening correspondent\naccounts for them..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 2015 HSBC was fined by the Geneva authorities after\nan investigation into money laundering within its Swiss subsidiary. The fine\nwas 40 million Swiss Francs. In July 2016 the Justice Department charged two\nexecutives from HSBC Bank over an alleged $3.5 billion currency scheme which\ndefrauded HSBC clients and \"manipulated the foreign exchange market to\nbenefit themselves and their bank<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2016, HSBC was sued\nby Mexican families involved in deaths by organized-crime gangs for processing\nfunds (\"money laundering\") for the Sinaloa Cartel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today this bank HSBC started\nto launder Opium Drug Money has around 4,000 offices in 70 countries and\nterritories across Africa, Asia, Oceania, Europe, North America and South\nAmerica, and around 37 million customers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following search\nwarrants and raids beginning in January 2013, in mid-March 2013 Argentina's\nmain taxing authority accused HSBC of using fake receipts and dummy accounts to\nfacilitate money laundering and tax evasion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 2013, a media\noutlet in India did an undercover expose where HSBC officers were caught on\ncamera agreeing to launder \"black money.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">HSBC placed these employees\non leave pending their own internal FAALTHU investigation.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">WE DON\u2019T WANT THIS\u2014WE DON\u2019T\nWANT ROGUE KOSHER BANKS TO DO SHAM INVESTIGATIONS AND DROP THE WOOL OVER OUR\nEYES</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HSBC\u2019s core values are\nunder scrutiny.&nbsp; The bank has been\nimplicated in one scandal after another, and&nbsp;\nthe current leadership claims to be wanting to restore the bank\u2019s\nreputation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">REPUTASSANN ? </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">&nbsp;MY ASS ! &nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But what reputation do\nthey aim to restore?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When HSBC executives\nwere caught financing the Mexican and other drug cartels, they were returning\nto the company\u2019s historic roots. HSBC\u2019s first wealth came from opium from India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hongkong and\nShanghai Bank was established in British Hong Kong in 1865 by OPIUM DRUG RUNNER\nJew Rothschild and was incorporated as The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation\nin 1866, and has been based in Hong Kong (although now as a subsidiary) ever\nsince.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was renamed The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited in\n1989. It is the founding member of the HSBC Group of Banks and Companies, since\n1990, is the namesake and one of the leading subsidiaries of the London-based\nHSBC Holdings PLC.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/o8F4EGpnIcY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/o8F4EGpnIcY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Use of the Internet to\ncommit identity theft has expanded the scope and impact of financial fraud schemes.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Personal identifying\ninformation and the information used for account access can be stolen through\nhacking or social exploits in which the victim is tricked into revealing data\nor providing access to a computer system in which the data is stored.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A stolen identity can be used to facilitate\nfraud and &nbsp;launder the proceeds. Stolen\nidentity information can be used remotely to open a bank or brokerage account, register\nfor a prepaid card, and apply for a credit card.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drug trafficking is a\ncash business generating an estimated $ 82&nbsp;\nbillion annually from U.S. sales. Mexico is the primary source of supply\nfor some drugs and a transit point for others. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/HA361RLKno0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/HA361RLKno0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three stages of\nmoney laundering are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1) placement, in which\nillicit proceeds are introduced into the financial system; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(2) layering, in which\nthe criminal attempts to separate the proceeds from the crime through a series\nof transactions; and</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;(3) integration, (<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"> INTEGRASSANN </b>for commie\ncunt Kanhaiya Kumar ) where the illicit funds re-enter the economy disguised as\nlegitimate funds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/I_kA1mfzqvM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/I_kA1mfzqvM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">PM MODI CHALK UP SEMINARS FOR ALL BANK PERSONNEL ( INCLUDING CLERKS ) --&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHISTLE BLOWERS MUST KNOW THE INNER WORKINGS.</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">AADHAR CARD MUST BE MADE COMPULSORY--WITH A DEAD LINE FOR</span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: x-large;\"> KYC</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/XwZNgguaxOU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/XwZNgguaxOU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">CONTENT\nGLEANED FROM THIS &nbsp;BLOG POST &nbsp;SERIES MUST BE PART OF NCERT SCHOOL ECONOMICS\nAND CURRICULUM OF BUSINESS SCHOOLS.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Law firms connect all\nsorts of operations to their financial or business partners.&nbsp; Unfortunately, they also provide one of the\nvital junctions where crooks aim to disguise themselves to infiltrate the\nabove-board economy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering is an\nadjunct to terrorism, people-smuggling, drug dealing and other criminal\nactivity. By thwarting money laundering, criminals are denied access to the\nfruits of their crimes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lawyers may be at risk\nof being deceived into facilitating money laundering. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Compliance with\nmoney-laundering obligations is one of the greatest challenges for solicitors <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering can\nappear in numerous forms, from international criminal organisations and the\nproceeds of overseas corruption through to smaller-scale laundering by local\ndrug dealers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large firms, small\nfirms and all those firms in between are at risk of being targeted by would-be\nmoney launderers. It is important that all firms, regardless of their size,\nconduct a firm-wide money-laundering risk assessment to ensure they are aware\nof the specific risks relating to the services they undertake and a thorough\nrisk assessment of any clients<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Legal firms can express\ntheir professionalism in the highest sense by demonstrating that they are the\nfirst line of detection in keeping business clean.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The big danger is that\nlawyers could underestimate the risk of being caught up in a money-laundering\nscam, especially if they operate at the smaller end of the scale, with a\nreputation for probity and a roster of highly respectable clients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering is a\nscourge on professional services at all ends of the spectrum and occurs through\nboth new and established clients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most big City law firms\nare now very much aware of the risks they face and almost invariably have\nsophisticated compliance systems in place. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Firms must be on the\nlookout for suspicious activity and have in place a nominated person as their\nmoney-laundering reporting officer (MLRO), who has the responsibility of\nalerting the authorities if their suspicions are aroused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The role of the Money\nLaundering Reporting Officer (MLRO) carries significant responsibility and\nshould be undertaken by an appropriately experienced individual<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You should also appoint\nan alternate or deputy MLRO for situations when the MLRO is unavailable, and\nensure that the reporting channels are well known to all relevant employees .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, while the MLRO\nis often seen as the figurehead, the responsibility for complying with all AML\nlegislation lies with the management of the entity as a whole. They cannot\nabdicate and must go to jail if due diligence is not exhibited<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their primary task of a\nMLRO&nbsp; is to consider internal reports of\nmoney laundering, then to decide if there are sufficient grounds for suspicion\nto pass those reports on to National Crime Agency (NCA) in the form of a\nSuspicious Activity Report (SAR), and, if they think that there is, to make\nthat SAR.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are also required to act as the key liaison point with NCA and\nlaw enforcement agencies including dealing with consent and disclosure issues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being an MLRO can be\ndemanding and the Solicitors Regulation Authority emphasises that the nominee\nshould have sufficient seniority to encourage reporting of suspicious activity.\nThat means that they can assess the risk of money laundering posed by the firm\u2019s\nwork and know the criteria regarding when to make a suspicious activity report\n(SAR) and when to stop acting for the client.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAR analysis has shown\nthat the legal sector is vulnerable to criminals using solicitors to set up\noffshore companies and move money via client accounts, using firms to add an\nadditional layer of complexity and respectability to their transactions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminals seek the\nassistance of accountants as well, to launder money via corporate vehicles and\nconceal the true ownership of property in mortgage applications, as well as\nfacilitate tax evasion and VAT fraud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ANTI MONEY LAUNDERING\nDEPT MUST HAVE A HOTLINE&nbsp;&nbsp; ..&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS NUMBER\nMUST BE POSTED PROMINENTLY AT THE ENTRANCE WITH SPECIFIC FONT AND&nbsp; LETTER SIZE.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
