text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panama Papers leak gave\nus a glimpse of the notoriously secretive Central American law firm Mossack\nFonseca \u2013 which exposed 12 current and former world leaders and 29\nForbes-listed billionaires.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca, &nbsp;has branches in Hong Kong, Miami, Zurich and\nmore than 35 other places around the globe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A U.S. businessman\nconvicted of traveling to Russia to have sex with underage orphans signed\npapers for an offshore company while he was serving his prison sentence in New\nJersey, the records show.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The records show soccer\nstar Messi and his father were owners of a Panama company: Mega Star\nEnterprises Inc. This adds a new name to the list of shell companies known to\nbe linked to Messi. His offshore dealings are currently the target of a tax\nevasion case in Spain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whether they\u2019re famous\nor unknown, Mossack Fonseca works aggressively to protect its clients\u2019 secrets.\nIn Nevada, the records show, the law firm tried to shield itself and its\nclients from the fallout from a legal action in U.S. District Court by removing\npaper records from its Las Vegas branch and having its tech gurus wipe\nelectronic records from phones and computers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.swissfinancialyard.ch/en/shell-company-in-switzerland/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.swissfinancialyard.ch/en/shell-company-in-switzerland/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The leaked files show\nthe firm regularly offered to backdate documents to help its clients gain\nadvantage in their financial affairs. It was so common that in 2007 an email\nexchange shows firm employees talking about establishing a price structure \u2014\nclients would pay $8.75 for each month farther back in time that a corporate\ndocument would be backdated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The firm added that the\nbackdating of documents \u201cis a well-founded and accepted practice\u201d that is\n\u201ccommon in our industry and its aim is not to cover up or hide unlawful acts.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The firm said it\ncouldn\u2019t answer questions about specific customers because of its obligation to\nmaintain client confidentiality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2.6 terabytes of\ndata \u2014 11 million documents including emails, bank accounts, client records\nfrom all the way back in 1977 \u2014 give details of persons who made use of the\n\u201ctrust services\u201d offered by Mossack Fonseca to set up shell companies,\npresumably for stowing away ill-gotten wealth in offshore tax havens (wealth\nthat could be on the level, or accumulated by money laundering or other corrupt\npractices).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From its base in\nPanama, one of the world\u2019s top financial secrecy zones, Mossack Fonseca seeds\nanonymous companies in Panama, the British Virgin Islands and other financial\nhavens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Several other celebrities find dubious\nmention, including sportsman Lionel Messi, film personalities Amitabh Bachchan,\nand Jackie Chan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Some 600 Israeli\ncompanies and 850 Israeli shareholders are listed in the leaked documents of\nPanamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To obtain \u201cWhite\nListed\u201d status, recognized by the G8, the G20 and others, an offshore\njurisdiction must proclaim:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1 \u2013 We are a sovereign\nstate of absolute transparency. That means, we accept the fact that there is no\nlegitimate argument whatsoever in favor of anonymity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2 \u2013 We do not sell bea\nrer shares. All anonymous shell companies, trusts and IBCs are immediately\ninvalid. Former holders will have to reapply to own the new form of IBC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3 \u2013 The new, fully\ntransparent IBC provides that beneficial owners must have a stake in the\nisland. Among other things, beneficial owners employ a local company formation\nagent, a local lawyer, locally accredited accountants, local nominee directors\nand have a local office. No companies in the jurisdiction have been or can be\nformed by foreign company formation agents, nor are foreign based nominee\ndirectors permitted. Furthermore, all of these new IBCs have a banking\nrelationship on the island, and meet fair but serious capital requirements.\nOnly Class A (onshore) and Class B (offshore) banks are permitted and in both\ncases, the treasury is physically present on the island.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4 \u2013 No licenses are\ngranted for online gambling. Sports betting, with reputable firms, is\nconsidered on an ad hoc basis but, then, only as long as their servers are on\nthe island. These companies have also hired local directors for oversight and\nmeet fair but serious capital requirements.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5 \u2013 Local directors are\nheld responsible for failing to take sufficient steps to prevent money\nlaundering, fraud, mis-invoicing, and/or other crimes. We demand strict\nrequirements for enhanced due diligence and violators are subject to\nprosecution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6 \u2013 Inquiries by\ncompetent law enforcement or judicial authorities are answered and fully met.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7 \u2013 We maintain an\nactive and up to date database of beneficial owners. There is a second, active\nand up to date database of shareholders. Both databases are publicly available.\nThat\u2019s because we believe that corporations and corporate rights and privileges\nare granted by the state. It is only right and proper that the public knows to\nwhom the state has, in their name, given those rights and privileges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8 \u2013 All locally licensed\nentities file reports, similar to SEC form 8K, to announce major events that\nregulators should know about. Failure to do will result in an immediate\nrevocation of the company\u2019s license.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9 \u2013 No activities, even\nsubsidiary activities, take place in FATF and/or CFATF blacklisted\njurisdictions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10 \u2013 Subsequent to a\ncourt order, assets of companies suspected of illegal activities are frozen. In\nthe event of conviction, all assets are confiscated and civil proceedings begin\nimmediately to assess damages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DR Congo lost out\non $1.3 billion or twice the country\u2019s health and education budgets when key\nmining assets were sold off extremely cheaply to anonymously-owned British\nVirgin Island (BVI) companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2004, a former\nKenyan anti-corruption advisor, John Githongo, blew the whistle on a massive\nKenyan corruption scandal, that became known as the \u2018Anglo Leasing\u2019 affair,\nafter the name of one of the BVI companies involved.&nbsp; The scandal cost the country nearly $1 billion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ex-Nigerian oil\nminister, Dan Etete, awarded a lucrative oil block to an anonymously-owned\ncompany, that later turned out to be owned by himself.&nbsp; The money from the deal was distributed to\nBVI companies.&nbsp; The ex-President of\nNigeria, Sani Abacha used the pretence of fake national emergencies to steal\nmore than $2 billion from the country.&nbsp;\nThe money was held via BVI, Jersey and other companies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ex-Prime Minister\nof Pakistan, Benazir Bhutto, and her husband are accused of having received\nkickbacks from gold import licenses via a BVI company that was secretly owned\nby Bhutto\u2019s husband.&nbsp; It has been reported\nthat Bhutto and her husband stole over $1 billion from the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ringfencing occurs when\na portion of a company's assets or profits are financially separated without\nnecessarily being operated as a separate entity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A ring fence is a\nprotection-based transfer of assets from one destination to another, usually\nthrough the use of offshore accounting. &nbsp;It is meant to protect the assets from\ninclusion in an investor's calculable net worth or to lower tax consequences.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the 70s, Panama officially\nadopted what has now become the standard tax haven model based on a process\nknown as \u201cring-fencing,\u201d which involves exempting foreign investors and their\ninternational business companies from taxes, enforcing strict banking secrecy\nlaws, and offering competitive incorporation laws.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The revised legislation led\nforeign investors to flock to Panama and there, the financial services sector\nboomed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Saudi royal family\nmembers have erected high walls around their palaces, bought overseas assets\nwith shell companies, used intermediaries for large investments and demanded\nnondisclosure agreements from employees. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great strength of a\nshell company is that it can shield its owner\u2019s identity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tracing illicit funds\nto a shell\u2019s bank account is of little use if you cannot identify the\nindividuals who control it.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though Kerala is one of\nthe best-banked States, there exists a strong parallel illegal credit system,\ntoo.&nbsp;&nbsp; These \u2018blade companies\u2019 charge\nextremely high rates of interest, often ranging from 150 per cent to 300 per\ncent a year.&nbsp; &nbsp;These companies often employ goondas to\nrecover money from the borrowers. Many murders, lynching and suicides are\nlinked to these companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.deccanchronicle.com/nation/in-other-news/070616/loan-sharks-out-as-operation-kubera-goes-to-sleep-in-kerala.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.deccanchronicle.com/nation/in-other-news/070616/loan-sharks-out-as-operation-kubera-goes-to-sleep-in-kerala.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/PnMfvTEkh1s/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/PnMfvTEkh1s?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vnEBcpe3MMw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/vnEBcpe3MMw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 14 BELOW--</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_8.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_8.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
